2b1(mdo sde): nu bcom ldan 'das rgyal po khri ba/ de bzhin gshegs par
2b2(mdo sde): spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khams/ de bzhin
2b3(mdo sde): gyi tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa/ 
2b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon
3a1(mdo sde): pa grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pa gnas pa/ bstan pa mtha'
3a2(mdo sde): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pas byin gyis brlabs pa chags pa med pa'i
3a3(mdo sde): spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyed pa/ dran pa dang / 
3a4(mdo sde): blo gros dang / rtogs pas 'jug pa kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par
3a5(mdo sde): dpyad pa/ de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa/ bskal pa mu med par
3b1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa bzhugs te bcom ldan 'das chos
3b2(mdo sde): thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor slob
3b3(mdo sde): ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshigs ni ma'/ chos thams cad la ma tha dbang ni brnyes/ sems
3b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi bsam pa/ bsgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/ dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rol
3b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa ni brnyes/ ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/ sangs
3b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma tshad cing // dge slong 'bum dag dag cu'i dge slong
4a1(mdo sde): / gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan
4a2(mdo sde): pa nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/ 
4a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/ chos zab mo/ ral gnas pa/ dmigs pa med
4a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin gnas
4a5(mdo sde): chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems
4a6(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dmigs pa med po'i byang chub sems
4a7(mdo sde): dpapa'i bzod pa rab tu thob po/ dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs pa/ mngon
4b1(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mi zad pa'i za ma tog rab tu thob
4b2(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa sems can thams
4b3(mdo sde): cad tshoms par byed pa rjes su thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub pas nges par byung ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhag pa'i bsam
4b4(mdo sde): pa la shin tu gnas pa/ tshad med grongs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med gzhal du med dadag tu med pa la 'di lta ste/ byang
4b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe rin po mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chudab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
4b6(mdo sde): tshad med pa zhes bya ba dang / bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa shes bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'
4b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus gong ba
4b8(mdo sde): med ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus blo gros shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
5a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa med pa'i mi 'jigs
5a2(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ don nges par brtags te lta ba zhes bya ba dang / de las sogs pa
5a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med dpag tu
5a4(mdo sde): myod pa dag dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba
5a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa med pa'i sgo byang chub sems dang 'i la me bkod pa la dmigs pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
5a6(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad yongasu 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgra'i 'jug pa/ so sor
5a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pas rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa'i sgo/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye she sa la 'bab pas 'jug pa phyir mi lde gzil khor phyi mi ldog
5a8(mdo sde): theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med/ tshul gcig pa rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa sems can thams cad kyi
5b1(mdo sde): bsam pa dang dbang po'i tshul la 'jug pa ston pa/ snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
5b2(mdo sde): 'joms pa tshul bzhin du chos kyi tshul la bab cing 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes
5b3(mdo sde): la 'jug pa/ kun tu bsngo ba'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ 
5b4(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za ba ston pa mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog
5b5(mdo sde): ste mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ na cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogapar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs
5b6(mdo sde): chen po sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsungs dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / 
5b7(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab mo zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul 'jug pa/ 
5b8(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa tshon pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen par
6a1(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod
6a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir gsung ston// rab tu 'chad do// 'dzin du 'jug/ klog tu 'jug/ shes par mdzad do// rnam par shes par mdzad do// rab tu shes par mdzad do// rab tu 'god do// rnam
6a3(mdo sde): par byed do// rnam par 'grel te/ gsal bar mdzod// yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don shin tu rnam par nges pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos
6a4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi nga stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu/ sa'i
6a5(mdo sde): sdeng nas bzung ba yan chad/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor kyi gzhi la thugs pa'i bar dag tu chos yongasu gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig ltar kun tu snang ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 
6a6(mdo sde): bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'das nas chags pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad chus yongasu gang bar gyur te/ chu'i dkyil 'khor
6a7(mdo sde): gyi yongasu 'khor ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad chus yongasu gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas par kun tu snang yang / 
6a8(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i 'khor rnams la yang / sgrib pa med/ 
6b1(mdo sde): par kun tu snang ngo // 'dzam bu gling rnams dang / gling bzhing chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la yang / sngon ji lta bar byis kyang de bzhin du
6b2(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo // chu'i phung po las kyang pad+ma chub ni bai DUr+ya/ gal ba ni and rnyil/ lo ma ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser/ ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po// snying po no rje'i snying po las
6b3(mdo sde): grub pa/ mu tig gi dra bas ni khebs par byas pa/ 'dab mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad ni rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po drung ste/ 
6b4(mdo sde): de dag rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi gzhi las thal nas/ shing ta la'i srid du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang de'i tshe/ pad+ma la 'khod par kun tu snang // pad+ma de dag
6b5(mdo sde): las kyang 'od gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa'i// 'od de lta bu dag byung ngo // de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i
6b6(mdo sde): 'khor ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ ji ltar snga ltas 'di dag kun tu snang ba chen las na/ kye ma'o// 'di ni chos bstan pa chen por 'gyuraro zhes ched du brjod pa che du brjod// de nas byang chub sems
6b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ cho 'phrul rgya chen po de mthong nas/ pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag gcig tu bags nas pus me g.yas pa'i lhang pad+ma'i snying po la gtsug te/ 
6b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
7a1(mdo sde): 'di nas kyis yo ba ldam pa'i rgyamacho gcig 'a bu kun tu gapar ba dang / badra bye ga khrag phrag brgyasna 'di da cig mngon par byung ba'ang dag dang / bcom ldan
7a2(mdo sde): 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i chos 'phrul rgya chen po 'di dag kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
7a3(mdo sde): chen po byams ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi rangs
7a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po tshe dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
7a5(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i mchog mngar/ ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos
7a6(mdo sde): kyang ston pa yod/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang
7a7(mdo sde): lhan cig tung la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos bstan pa 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'di
7a8(mdo sde): ni de'i snga ltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho zag ring por nga srid
7b1(mdo sde): cig na mchis shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod ji ltar nga'i mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
7b2(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug cing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan to// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis ji ltar nga dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub seng
7b3(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtshos kyang dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o// ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
7b4(mdo sde): shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thag ring po de srid na mchis kyang mig gis gzugs mthong ba la sgrib pa ma mchis shing / rna bas sgra thos pa la sgrib pa ma
7b5(mdo sde): mchis pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid sam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas/ su zhig bla na med pa
7b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu nyi khri ba ni stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 
7b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis kun nas bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu
7b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i mchog mngar ba'i blos rnam par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang ste/ sangs rgyas rnam
8a1(mdo sde): par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang sems cig gis thob pa'i dran pas mig bye ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams
8a2(mdo sde): yon tan rin po che'i dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khams kyi
8a3(mdo sde): gzhi las thal nas/ shing rta la srid du mngon par 'phags te/ pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug par kun tu snang ngo // de las gzhan pa'i pad+ma'i sring po rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8a4(mdo sde): bo de dag 'khod par kun tu snang // 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ches
8a5(mdo sde): nyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang
8a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma la 'khod pa dag gis/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams shin tu rgyas pas mdzes te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nga'o// de na thams cad
8a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba thob nas thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal to// de nas byang chub sems
8a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa na yod pa'i me tog mya ngan med cing yid du 'ong ba mthong / 
8b1(mdo sde): na dga' ba zhes bya ba mngab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshang rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog par 'ong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
8b2(mdo sde): bsam pas rnam par dag pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu sbyangs pa rnam par bkra ba/ mig tu sdug pa 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa kun nas 'od dang ldan pa/ kun nas shin tu yid
8b3(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i dri dang ldan pa'i me tog de 'dra ba dag/ mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ me tog gi char nges rin po che
8b4(mdo sde): bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyam su/ mi bdun gyi pang rtsam gyi me tog dgram pa dkram par gyur to// rab tu dben pa 'i bsam gtan gyi zas shes bya ba'i sil snyan yang
8b5(mdo sde): bsgrags te/ sil snyan gyi sgra des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du bdag bde bas tshim par sheso// de nas byang chub
8b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po blo gros rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 'di lta bur byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba
8b7(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtshos mchog mnga'
8b8(mdo sde): ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde bar reg pa la
9a1(mdo sde): gnas sam zhes snyun gsele// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
9a2(mdo sde): te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas slar rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba/ mya ngan med pa'i glang bde ba chen pa
9a3(mdo sde): na gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ni 'dug pas/ stong gsum gyi sbom po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus yongasu gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bu yong mthong / pad+ma rnams par bkra ba
9a4(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya brag stong mngon bar byung ba yang mthong / rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams byang chub sems dpas gang yang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di
9a5(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ sreg pa'i bskal pa ni ma byung na// chus 'jig pa 'di byung ste/ 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul 'di dag kun tu snang ba 'di la rgyu ci yod/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
9a6(mdo sde): song ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos chen po 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags zhes zhu'o snyamo// de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems
9a7(mdo sde): bar tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis yongasu bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyamasu
9a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ lus gtud thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa snying rje chen
9b1(mdo sde): bo sems pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chab kyis yongasu bltab pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur
9b2(mdo sde): kun tu gda' ba dang / bad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brag 'di snyed cig byung ba 'di dang / de dag la yang skyes bu dam pa dag mchis pa 'di lta bu kun tu ganga' yang / bcom ldan 'das stong
9b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la yang sgrib pa ma mchis par kun tu
9b4(mdo sde): gangar ba dang / la m+bu ri gling rnams dang / gli zhi ba chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho rnams dang / ri rab rnam sa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la yang
9b5(mdo sde): sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci yang ma/ mchis par de kho na bzhin du kun tu ganga' ba de la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur snyam du bdag ngo mtshar
9b6(mdo sde): cher gyur na/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa 'di ni
9b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan
9b8(mdo sde): rin po madri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba
10a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tung la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gtam gyi
10a2(mdo sde): rgyud 'ga' zhig yongasu dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba yin te/ gang stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rkus yongasu gang bar kun tu snang ba 'di lta
10a3(mdo sde): bu 'di ni de'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlab so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dadung yang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chang ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
10a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la nits+tsha/ ngan chad pa cung zad kyang med/ gang gi tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar gyur pa mthong ba de'i chen
10a5(mdo sde): yang nga ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos rnam pa ra nges pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ tshangs pa
10a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni de ltar bsam gyis mi khya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di lta bu 'di rnam par sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bgyi
10a7(mdo sde): bde gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod kyis pad+ma dpag tshad bcu'i khyon tsam yid pa de'i dkyil na pad+ma'i snying po la/ rin po che bkod pa'i sang+ga'i khri 'phang
10a8(mdo sde): du shing rta la bdun tsam pa/ srog chags bye ba phrag mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa
10b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis se blo khri de la byang chub sems dpa' lus gser gyi kha dog tu 'dus pa lus mtshan pe byed bzang pos legs par brgyad pa 'dug ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skum gtogs
10b2(mdo sde): bar gzhan byang chub sems dpa' lus zil kyis mnan nas 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags// bcom
10b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpor sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mchi zhes bya ba ste/ 'di pa'i rnam par sprul pa'o// de nas tshangs pasnyid rna chen po se
10b4(mdo sde): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag byas nag/ tshig 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
10b5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ gang dag byang chubasems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i ming thob pa'i sems can/ de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags// bcom ldan
10b6(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i ming thos shing gzugs kyi lus kyang mthong bas bdag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyedo// bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i
10b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid cig tu 'chad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad gnas pa dang / de
10b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / rgyas
11a1(mdo sde): par byed kyi bar du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs rnams kyi byang chub ni di nang du dus pa'i
11a2(mdo sde): phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'khor thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa'i sems
11a3(mdo sde): dang 'thun par bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brgyan par bya ba dang / bdag nyid kyi shes rab dang / spobs pa'i stobs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir pad+ma dang lhan cig/ seng ge'i khri dang lhan cig/ 
11a4(mdo sde): Sh+ya steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun srid tsam na 'dug ste/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// khrag khrig sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed kyi ning rnams 'das pa'i 'og logs na/ rdzogs pa'i
11a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas shing yon tan kun ldan rab ma// dzes pa/ de na 'dren pa brtan rgya mtsho'i blo thugs mtshungs pa med/ debazhugs te/ der ni bdag gis thub pa'i chos thos
11a6(mdo sde): gyur te thos nas de bzhin bzung // bdag ni stobs bcu ldan la blta bar bgyi dang de bzhin phyag bgyi dang // byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'di rnams phan tshun dri slad 'dir
11a7(mdo sde): mchis te// skyob la phyag bgyi bas ni chos rgyal mtshungs med khyod la 'dir phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang lags rgya chen shin tu rgyas pas mchod pa 'tshal/ gang gi
11a8(mdo sde): gzugs la gzugasu mi rtog tshor ba 'dus bgyis ma lags shing // rnam par shes pa'ang tshor gsum bzhin du rtag par shin tu rnam dag te// gang zhig 'dren la mtshan du ma lags skye
11b1(mdo sde): dang rig su ma lags rtogs// mig ldan des ni chos kyi rgyal po dri med yang dge bar don tu mthong // bdag gam bdag med ces bya'i mtha' de gnyi das dor te// nang du gyur pa zhi ning
11b2(mdo sde): thugs kyang zhi ste phyi rol rgyu mi mnga'// mi rtog rnam mi rtag cing rtag bral thub pa'i thugs ni rnam pa' 'dra// des ni phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan gsal
11b3(mdo sde): mdzad rnams la mchod// gang blo sbyin pa rnams la 'di ni sgyu ma len pa stong pa nyid// g.yo ba med pa'i yid kyis nor rnams de dag rig pa med par gtong // byang chub don tu nges
11b4(mdo sde): kyi lta bar nges min spros la gnas ma yin// gang blo sems can nyes palang kyi po 'byin bdag ser sna med// de da ni rab tu zhi bas zhi ste ngag med lus gdung med// gdung
11b5(mdo sde): ba med pas bcing ba rgya chen bral te nges pa dbang po ni/ bdag med theg par gnas nas byang chub dmigs pa med cing da mi 'dor// khrims gnas blo ldan khrims 'chal
11b6(mdo sde): thar byed 'dod pa tshul khrims dri ma med// chos rnams skad cig par ni rtogs pa shes bya rnams la smras pa med// na mkha' mtshungs pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma ji bzhin
11b7(mdo sde): mthong // gang zhig lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang yid ni khro mi 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub brtul zhugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas te bzod pa smra// gang zhig chos rnams chu zla chu bur
11b8(mdo sde): mnyam ning skum sgeg rtsu 'dra// rtogs nas ma tshon srog ma min na shes bu ldan pa ma yin mang // byang chub dang ni sems can chags mi migs kyang byang chub gzhan ngan brtson// nul
12a1(mdo sde): di gang zhig grag pa med pa den brtson 'grus pa sar byin// gang gsenas ni yul la chags pa med cing tsho chos mang mdal// sems can gan gyi mas
12a2(mdo sde): spyod pa dus gsum gyur pa 'ang shes pa dang // gang sems spyod par gyur pa gang yin de yi 'dud kyis mi shes pa// pha rol byin thob bsam gtan dang ni mngon par shes la blo gros gnas// gang
12a3(mdo sde): zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung kun nyan cing de bzhin 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa dpag tu med par smras kyang slebs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can
12a4(mdo sde): mi ltung de ni gang du'ang gnas med pa// bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rten gsum ngan dpa'// gang zhig pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol gshegs min ma
12a5(mdo sde): gshegs min// gang zhig sems can spyod pa 'i mthar byin mi gnas g.yo ba mi mnga' zhing // yon tan kun mthar gang byin yon tan rnams rlom sems mi mnga' ba/ 
12a6(mdo sde): thub pa'i dbang ba shAkyas ngas rgyas khyumachog de la mge bas drug/ 'di zer nam ngag gims srin bum khyer 'ang rnams zil gyis mnan// mye lce rtse mngon parnal mama'i ma 'osas la ji rnyed pa
12a7(mdo sde): ji sreg rim chog ba gyis ni sa 'i mad pa'i na rnaMl du mnan// shA khrumachag sdu rjes 'jig rten gsum gyi 'ang ga'an pal du ga/ zhing brgya banam lpag pa bya
12a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyam chag phreng ba// de dag ga cis kyi kyimache ga nga gapa chung byin tshim par gyur// gang dag blam la ma'i ltar das pa 'i steng gyis 'dzin pa mam/ 
12b1(mdo sde): gang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na ni 'dug par shes// ji ltar gang gis rang rig de ltar khyod kyi gzung ni shin tu 'jug/ srid pa gsum na skad rnams ji snyed ci mchis de dang 'thun par 'jug/ 
12b2(mdo sde): rdul gyi rdul dang mi rnams kyi ni sems kyi bsam pa bgrang nus srid// thub pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med na mkha' 'dra 'di bgrang bar nus ma lags// namakha'i mtha' dang mi rnams kyi ni mtha' ma
12b3(mdo sde): bgrang bar mi nus te// 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma nyid ni rnam pa kun tu bgrang mi nus// namakha'i mtha' dang 'khor ba'i mtha' ni mi yis bgrang bar nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas
12b4(mdo sde): mkhyen dang ti nge 'dzin tshul khrims yun ni gang du'ang shes mi nus// gzhal yas bskal par gang gi bsngags pa brjod par sla ba ma lags pa// khyu mchog dpag tshad chos kyi dbang phyug
12b5(mdo sde): 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// skye bo gang gshes dang mos pas sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa// de/ ngag gis ni blo gros bsam yas rmad byung kun lhag 'dren pa
12b6(mdo sde): mthong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da ba' chen ba zla gros rgya mtshos tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
12b7(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas nu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom
12b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
13a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mchos la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
13a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa 'dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de ngas lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
13a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting 'dzin shin tu dkar ba dri ma med
13a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ ting 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
13a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bdag gis thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu dgar badri ma med pa'i phyag rgyar ting 'dzin ji ltar
13a6(mdo sde): ba dang ci'i slad du shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa zhes 'gyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de legs par bshad du gsol/ ting 'dzin de la 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug pa gang thos
13a7(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ti nge 'dzin 'di 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/ bcom
13a8(mdo sde): ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gzil ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa blo gros rgya mchar
13b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa leg so lag so// kye ma dri ba 'di bzang zhing dpyod pa de tshul bzhin yin te/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la rung shig dang / 
13b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam sgo shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin 'di ji ltar 'thob pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
13b3(mdo sde): rdzog pa la nga rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam
13b4(mdo sde): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtshos 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa yin te/ dag
13b5(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ nges pa'i phung po la rab tu gnas pa/ tshogs bsags pa/ dbang po rno ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa/ sangs rgyas
13b6(mdo sde): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ rgyu'i stobs can yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed/ sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed// songs
13b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong zhing / gsung snyan pa thos te/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang mthong zhing / chags pa med pa'i mkhyen pa yang
13b8(mdo sde): thos la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'am/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa yang mthong nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen
14a1(mdo sde): ba skyes te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ dge ba'i chos med su tshol ba la bcan 'ang bams
14a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i sems brjed pa med pas/ sems yongasu dag pa la rnal 'byor du byed// de sems yongasu dag pas ti nge 'dzin yongasu dag pa rab tu 'thob// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ 
14a3(mdo sde): dper na/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu sen pa/ ji tsam na yongasu dag pa dang / shin tu dkar ba dang / mthing bu dang bral ba dang / skyon med par
14a4(mdo sde): gyur pa de srid du yongasu sbyangs na/ skyes bu mtha ba nir bu rin po che la mkhas pa rnams 'du bar 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rigs 'phags pas thams cad
14a5(mdo sde): mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che bskyed nas/ bla na med/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam na mthing bu dang bral nas#
14a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de srid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sbyangs pa bya ba dang / thos pa la mkhas pa yongasu sbyangs pa bya bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
14a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa rin po ched yongasu sbyangs na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'du 'di/ shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin 'di yang 'thob// blo gros rgya
14a8(mdo sde): mchi 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin pa ched ni/ rin pa che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par 'thung ste/ dgu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rigs dang / dngul
14b1(mdo sde): gyi rigs dang / dadam ga rigs dang / shel gyi rigs dang / baiDUr+ya ni dang / drugachags dang / mu tig dmar par rigs dang / shes par chags dang / dpal gyi snang ba tshigs
14b2(mdo sde): te/ nor bu rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas/ dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rigs de las de rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin pa
14b3(mdo sde): cher 'gyur te/ de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yongasu spyad par 'gyur gyi/ de ma yin pa sems can phal pa gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od gang yin pa des ni/ 
14b4(mdo sde): de ma yin pa'i nor bu rin po che gzhan rnams kyi 'od mog 'do// byed// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen/ par sems bskyed pa'i rin po che yang rin po che'i rigs dgu las
14b5(mdo sde): shin tu 'das par 'byung ste/ dgu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ so so'i skye bo'i dge pa rin po che'i rigs dang / dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rjesu 'brang
14b6(mdo sde): ba rin po che'i rigs dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rin po che'i rigs dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rin po che'i dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rim
14b7(mdo sde): po che'i rigs dang / gra sa pa ri rje'i rigs dang / rangs rgyas rinapo che'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas/ bcu pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhag pa'i
14b8(mdo sde): bsam pa snying rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che 'byung ste/ de yongs sbyangs na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non
15a1(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud rnams la yang snang bar byed// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che chen po de gang gi tshe sbyangs pa bzod cing gnod
15a2(mdo sde): pa bzod pa la phugs nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams la phan pa byed par 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya
15a3(mdo sde): mtshe de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de yang gang gi tshe sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/ bus nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin
15a4(mdo sde): po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba de 'di ltar sems can thams ca dra la phan pa byed par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams ca da mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyang ba gang zhe
15a5(mdo sde): na/ 'di lta ste/ sdom pa gsum gyis dge babacu'i las kyi lam yongasu dag pa dang / byams pa'i rjesu 'jug pasasems can thams cad la byams shing dang ba dang / 
15a6(mdo sde): snying rje'i rjesu 'jug pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la brtson pa dang / dga' ba'i rjesu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang / btang snyoms kyi rjesu
15a7(mdo sde): 'jug pas sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing rtag tu sems drang ba dang / g.yo dang sgyu med par phan pa'i dngos po'i bsam par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa la
15a8(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang / cang shes kyi sems kyis dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / sems shin tu dul bas sems la su rung ba dang / dgang sla bas sbyangs pa'i/ 
15b1(mdo sde): yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa dang / graso slabs 'phags pa'i rigs mchog shes pa dang / bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud cing rab tu 'dud pa dang / 
15b2(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pas khengs pa dang / rtsod pa rnam par spong ba dang / sems nges par sems pas nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang / rnyog pa med pas sems gsal ba
15b3(mdo sde): dang / bdag la mi stong pas bdag shes pa la 'jug pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pas sems can rjes su srung ba dang / sman gyi sems kyis chos gus pa dang / de'i don so/ 
15b4(mdo sde): sor myong bas chos don tu gnyer ba dang / de la gnol 'bab/ bab pas chos 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas chos la dga' ba dang / chos ma yin pa rnam par spong bas
15b5(mdo sde): chos yongasu tshol ba dang / rtag tu ngo tsha shes pas dkon ma cho ga gsum la dad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / las kyi/ rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas mi dge ba thams
15b6(mdo sde): cad yid la mi byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa dang / drang bas spyod lam sbas pa dang / khengs pa med pas gnyen pa dang / zhi gnas yongasu tshol bas rgod pa dang / bral ba dang / blo
15b7(mdo sde): brtan pas snyoms las med pa dang / rab tu mi g.yo bas sems ri dang mtshungs pa dang / rje su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral bas sems dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam pa dag pas sems
15b8(mdo sde): chu dang mtshungs pa dang / rlom sems med pas sems me dang mtshungs pa dang / gnas med pas sems rlung dang mtshungs pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pas sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / 
16a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gnol ba dang / lus dben pa'i phyir dgon pa la dga' ba dang / sems dben pa'i phyir
16a2(mdo sde): chos la spyod pa dang / de byed cing yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang / kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba'i
16a3(mdo sde): phyir sems dpa' ba dang / shin tu nyams pa med pa'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / kha na ma tho ba bra rab la yang 'jig par lta ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims lhod pa med pa dang / 
16a4(mdo sde): skye bar smon pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims skyon med pa dang / gcig tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyir tshul khrims thun chags ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes
16a5(mdo sde): gnyen la bsten pa dang / mig yongasu dag pa'i phyir ro/ da zer thogs pa med pa dang / rna ba yeng su dag pa'i phyir sgra la thogs pa med pa dang / sna yongasu dag pa'i phyir dri la
16a6(mdo sde): thegs pa med pa dang / lce yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ re la thogs pa med pa dang / lus yong su dag pa'i phyir/ reg bya la thogs pa med pa dang / yid yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ chos la thogs
16a7(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mi sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ 
16a8(mdo sde): byams pa shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir/ gti mug gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ dbang po rnams
16b1(mdo sde): la shin tu brtag pa'i phyir/ sgrib pa dang / bral ba yin/ stobs yongasu dag pa'i phyir sgrib pa yang dag par bsal ba yin/ 'byung ba'i bya ba'i khams yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ 
16b2(mdo sde): kun nas ldang ba bsal ba yin/ yang dag par bslab pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa dang / nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/ chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa
16b3(mdo sde): yin zang zing gi sbyin pa la kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems med pa yin/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin/ dbang po sbas pa'i phyir nang nye bar zhi ba yin/ skyon
16b4(mdo sde): shin tu mthong ba'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhi ba yin/ sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir 'khor bas skrag pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongasu mi skye ba yin/ 
16b5(mdo sde): chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi glu chen po yang / dag par sbyar ba yin/ pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir stegs/ dang zam pa shin tu bcas pa yin/ thang la shin tu
16b6(mdo sde): bcas pa yin/ thang la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir 'dam dang / 'obs las rgal ba yin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe chos 'di lta bu
16b7(mdo sde): de dag gis dag pa dang / yongasu dag pa dang / sbyin pa 'phags pa dang / tshul khrims yong su dag pa de ni thams cad mkhyen par sems skyed pa rin po che de sbyong ba'o// de nas de'i tshe
16b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams shing / rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob// byams pas sems
17a1(mdo sde): / can kun la yang dag blta// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brtson// dga' dang ldan pas chos
17a2(mdo sde): la pha rol sbyor// gtad snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'chi ba med// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin// rtag tu drang zhing g.yo ni rnam par spangs// gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs
17a3(mdo sde): lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rje su 'jug/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin// shes rab rab 'jug dron dang shas bzhin can// sems rab dul bas sems ni lasu rung // sbyangs pa'i yon
17a4(mdo sde): tan rnams dang gso sla ba// 'di ni thams cad mkhye ngan pa'i sems sbyong yin// 'phags rigs chog shes pa dang tshig mnyen dang // bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed dang // rtsod
17a5(mdo sde): rdzun nga rgyal spangs dang stabs ldan dang // brnyas dang log/ pa nam yang byed ma yin// sems ni nges sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal bra la// rnyog pa med cing rab drung la gsal// bdag shes pa la
17a6(mdo sde): rim gyis 'jug par byed// gzhan la mi brnyas sems can rjesu gsung // chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas// bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni spong bar byed// chos don gnyer zhing chos
17a7(mdo sde): la rtog par byed// rtag tu chos don gzhol zhing 'bab par byed// chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med pa bsgoms// chos min spangs shing chos rnams yongasu tshol// dkon mchog gsum la
17a8(mdo sde): dad pa mi lnga phyed ldan// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyong yin// rtag tu mdzem dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo tshas sdom// khrel yod ldan zhing
17b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni dbang po bsdams// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin/ rab tu sbyor bas las kyi bya bar 'jug/ bag yod pas ni mtha' gnyis 'dzin mi
17b2(mdo sde): byed rnam pas brten pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin// spyod lam gyis ni drang ba'i dngos dang ldan// khengs pa med pas rtag tu mnyen pa nyid/ 
17b3(mdo sde): zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod pa med// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin// blo ni rab tu brtan pas nyams pa med// rtag mthong la ni ri rgyal ji bzhin te// dam bcas brtan zhing bar
17b4(mdo sde): skabs nyams pa med// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin// sdug bsngal bde bas mi g.yos sa dang mtshungs// bsam pa dag pas chu ltar dri ma 'khru// rtag tu rlom sems med
17b5(mdo sde): pas me dang mtshungs// gnas me rgyu bas rtag tu rlung dang 'a/ bra/ shin tu dri ma med pas mnyam sems// rab tu 'byung bas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa rnyed// lus ni dben zhing zhi bas dgon par
17b6(mdo sde): dga' rang sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod// dge ba bden par smra dang yang dag smra// ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin byed// nyon mongs mi rdzi dge la dpa' bo mchog/ shin tu bslab pas
17b7(mdo sde): bslabs pa yang dag 'dzin// de la lhod pa nam yang yong ma yin// kha na ma the chung la'ang rtag tu 'jigs// byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med// yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dres
17b8(mdo sde): ba med/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing sdig pa min// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems stsogs bya phyir brtan// de ltar de yi mig ni dri med kyis// 'jig rten kun la 'od zer mnyam par lta// mkhas
18a1(mdo sde): bad tshogs smram nas// dag seng mas pa med tsang dum pa med// rdo ldan dang sram ngan gas sheg/ des na pa ltar rnam dan ca/ rdzam
18a2(mdo sde): / lce yis ro rnams dang // lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos rnams la// reganas ma khengs ma dung zhum pa med// de ltar de yi dbang po dag pa nyid// chags pas ma chags sdang bas sdang bams
18a3(mdo sde): gti mug ma rmongs mi sdug gnas pa can// byams la dga' zhing rkyen gyis chos sems pa// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems spyong yin// sgrib pa lnga po dag gis sgrib pa med// de ltar
18a4(mdo sde): des ni dbang po lnga yang bsgom de ni gang du'ang ba sgrib med bcings pa'ang med// stobs rnams lnga po dag la rab tu gnas// kun nas ldang ba shes shing byung ba nyid// tshul bzhin ma yin spangs
18a5(mdo sde): shing tshul bzhin gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la ste na// yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan// byang chub yan lag sten dang rtag tu ldan// brtan pa de ni yan lag
18a6(mdo sde): brgyad la mchog/ de ni 'dod dang sdang dang 'jigs mi 'gro/ gti mug bral zhing dbang po shin tu bsdams// chos kyi sbyin la de ni ser sna med// slob dpon nam yang chos
18a7(mdo sde): 'chab mi byed// rang zing med par chos ni ston par byed depa ni de yi byang chub sems dag 'gyur// de ni zung zing rnams la kun 'dzin med// rnam smin re med 'dong bgu gtong bar byed// sbyin dang snyan
18a8(mdo sde): dang don byed don 'thun pas// da ni sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud// de yi byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur// theg pa dman la nam yang re ba med// ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas yo
18b1(mdo sde): mthong ba de lta de ltar de bsam ri rab 'dra// nang ni rab ni sred pa'i nyes pa mthong // de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul la lta mi byed// 'dus byas nyes pa dag kyang shin tu mthong // 'khor bas
18b2(mdo sde): 'jig pasdig pa rnams mi byed// legs spyong khur khyer bas ni skyo ba med// zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod pa nyams pa med// chos rnams yongasu bzung bas zhum pa med// sems
18b3(mdo sde): can thar byed rgyu la 'jigs pa med// chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral ba'i phyir// de ni chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed// lus can mya ngan las 'das lam gzung ba'i phyir// de ni stegs dang za
18b4(mdo sde): pa 'cha' bar byed// 'dam las 'das shing 'obs las rgal nas ni// thang la gnas shing de dag 'jigs med gnas// 'jigs pas g.yen spyo rnams la 'jigs med ston// 
18b5(mdo sde): bdag nyid rgal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol// gang dag chos tshul 'di dag rnam dag cing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems pa rtan kha lo sgyur// de dag byang chub sems
18b6(mdo sde): mchog rnam dag ste// nyon mongs dri mas gzhar yang gos mi 'gyur// ji ste namakha' nyon mongs bya bar nus// de la rjes kyang bstan par nus srid kyi// rang bzhin 'od gsal rdzogs
18b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems// de ni nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che yongasu sbyangs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bam po gnyis pa/ 
18b8(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gzod pa ni ji lta bu// thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnos nidang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho
19a1(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas/ 'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal
19a2(mdo sde): 9/ dud nams/ bdud kyi rig skye sta rnamam bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/ bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis gtses sam/ rnam par gtses sam/ bskyod dam kun tu bskyod dam/ dkrugs
19a3(mdo sde): sa ma kun tu dkrugs sam/ bsdigs sam/ brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i snying rje chen pos
19a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi byed pa dang / dkon ma chog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las mi phye da pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub
19a5(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi byed pa dang / ma tshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsogs pa las mi phyed pa dang / 
19a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang ba mngon par sgrub par brtson pa las mi byed pa dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam bcas pa'i yongasu 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi byed pa dang / sems
19a7(mdo sde): can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson zhing bdag bde ba la mi chags pa las mi phyed pa ste/ de de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas sems can thad
19a8(mdo sde): kyis dpyas kyang bzod/ thing smad byas pa dang / smad pa dang / bshud pa byas kyang bzod/ sems can thams cad kyis spyos sam/ bsdigs sam/ ngan du brjod dam/ ngan du smras
19b1(mdo sde): ba'i tshig gi lam yang bzod/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa yang gzod/ sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzod/ sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med/ zhum pa med/ kun tu zhum pa med/ 
19b2(mdo sde): sgyid lug pa med/ yi 'chad pa med kyi/ stobs nye bar ston par byed/ mthu skyed par byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom la/ rtul bas rtul bar byed/ spro bskyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi 'dzin to// 
19b3(mdo sde): de spyod kyang slar mi gshe/ brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg/ khros kyang slar mi khro/ 'khrugs kyang slar mi 'khrug ste/ de ltar sems can bgrang ba'i go cha gyeno// 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di ni
19b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i theg pa'o// de ci'i bying zhe na/ sems can de dag ni rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro bdag go// bdag ni rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o// sems can
19b5(mdo sde): de dag ni phan tshun mi 'thun pa dag gi/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi mi 'thun pa spong ba'i phyir go cha bgos par// sems can de dag ni gnod sems la dpa' bdag go// 
19b6(mdo sde): bdag ni bzod pa dang nges pa yongasu tshol ba'o// sems can de dag ni gcig la gcig yongasu 'drid par gnas pa dag go/ bdag ni shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongasu tshol ba'o// gal te sems
19b7(mdo sde): can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu phye ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ral gyi dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che lag na thogs te/ bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang sa phyogs gdu 'greng
19b8(mdo sde): ngam 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i sems sam/ tshul khrims kyi sems sam/ bzod pa'i sems sam/ brtson
20a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyi sems sam/ bsam gtan gyi sems sam/ shes rab kyi sems sam/ thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der/ 
20a2(mdo sde): bdag lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya che tsam du gtubs sam/ rnam par gtor ram/ rnam par bcom mam/ sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed par rgyun tu gshe 'am/ sdigs
20a3(mdo sde): sam smod dam/ kha shung ngam/ tshig ngan pa dang / ngag rtsub po smra ba de ltar gyur kyang / bdag gis sems can 'ga' la 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha
20a4(mdo sde): nas 'khor ba tshad med par byas te/ gang du gdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song dram/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ngam/ mir gyur
20a5(mdo sde): kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i zas kyi drims/ dri ma can du/ gyur nas/ chos thos pa dang mi ldan zhing yang nga'i 'tsho ba'i/ spyod yul don med pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te/ 
20a6(mdo sde): yan lag dang nying lag brgyar gshegs shing gtu bos to/ phye zhing phral la bya ba rnam pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis gzhi de las bdag gi don byas kyi gzhan gyi don ma byas pa'i
20a7(mdo sde): gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar bdag gi lus gshegs gtubs/ rnam par gtor rnam par bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa
20a8(mdo sde): yongasu mi gtong // sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong // dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yeng su mi gtong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di thams cad ni sems can
20b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro'o/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
20b2(mdo sde): gtang bar ni mi bya'o// sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mi gtong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te/ dge ba
20b3(mdo sde): la ni bar chad mdo// mi dge ba'i phyogs la ni grogs byed pa mdo// dge ba'i phyogs la ni grogs byed pa nyung zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs mi bya'o// dge
20b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs kyi grogs bya'o// sems can thams cad la/ bzod par bya'i gnod semasu mi bya'o// sems can de dag la gang yod pa de ma byin yang bdag gi sbyin par bya ste/ 
20b5(mdo sde): sems can de dag la gnod sems dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa yod pa de dag de rnams kyis ma byin yang dang ga la bzod pa dang / nges pa gang yod pa de bdag gis
20b6(mdo sde): sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan par bya'i/ gnod sems ni ma yin snyam// blo gros rgya mtsho lus dang srog 'dor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa
20b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin// gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung ba'i chos de dag gis spang bar bya'o snya mo// chos de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dga'
20b8(mdo sde): ba dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la chags pa ste/ lus btang na gnod sems kyang gtong // blo gros rgya mcho ltar bgrang ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
21a1(mdo sde): chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod/ mi skyo mi khro'o// de gnod pa gsum bzod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi gnod pa dang / ngag gi gnod pa dang / 
21a2(mdo sde): sems kyi gnod pa'o// blo gros rgya mchod la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad kyang chos la ston te/ gang de'i lus gcod pa'i/ 
21a3(mdo sde): sems can de nyid la lta ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya mtsho
21a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ gang lus 'dor ba dang / lus yongasu gtong ba dang / lus la mi lta ba
21a5(mdo sde): 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus yang su bcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab/ par byed pa dang / tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa 'di
21a6(mdo sde): ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus yong su gcod pa na gang dag de'i lus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod cing sems kyis rma mi phyin te/ bzod pa'i stobs
21a7(mdo sde): nye bar ston pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus gang gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dun pa mi 'dor zhing / sems kyi stobs bskyed pa yang rab tu 'dzin la/ 
21a8(mdo sde): 'khor ba nyid du mtshams kyang sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa yang rtsom pa 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus rnam par 'thor ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ 
21b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa rin po che de mi mjed cing byang chub nyid la lta ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu ni pa la so sor rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa'o// gang gcod pa na lus la
21b2(mdo sde): rdzas dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bur so sor rtog cing lus la sgyu ma'i chos nyid du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par na mi rtag pa nyid dang / yang dag par na sdug
21b3(mdo sde): bsngal ba nyid dang / yang dag par na bdag med pa nyid dang / yang dag par ma zhi ba nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na thabs
21b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pa pharol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / theg pa chen po de las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di na
21b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o// blo gros rgya mchod de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gan pa bzod pa gang zhen/ gang ngan du brjod pa'i tshig
21b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang du len pa dang / gshe ba dang / sdig pa dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / sdig mo byed pa thams cad bzod pa dang / yod pa 'am/ med pas/ glengs kyang mi khro ba dang / 
21b7(mdo sde): khon du mi 'dzin pa dang / bag la nyal spong ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan tu brjod pa dang / ngan tu smos pa'i tshig gi
21b8(mdo sde): lam dang / gshe ba dang / sdig pa dag pha rol las thos nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yingasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sem
22a1(mdo sde): dpa' ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan tu smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dag pha rol las thos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs
22a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan tu brjod pa dang / ngan tu smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe ba dang / bsdigs pa dag pha rol las
22a3(mdo sde): thos na/ dran pa 'di lta bu rab tu 'thob ste/ sems can 'di ni sngon nas ser sna can du gyur pa 'jungs pa ste/ ser sna'i dri mas kun tu bskor ba des/ gang dag de'i gnod sems
22a4(mdo sde): kyi dri ma spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ma bsten gus par ma byas/ bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o// bdag ni gtong ba las mos shing ser sna med par bya/ 
22a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam ste/ de dag srung zhing gnod sems kyang spong ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
22a6(mdo sde): byin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa las ma mthong ba ste/ de ni bdag le gshe zhing sdig pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims dang
22a7(mdo sde): brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las mi nyams par bya'o// gnod sems med par bya'o// byang chub kyi sems yongasu bsrung bar bya'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa la brtan par bya'o// 
22a8(mdo sde): snyam pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni zhe sdang gi shas che zhing gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ni bdag la gsha
22b1(mdo sde): zhing sdig pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs mang du byas te/ byams pa la gnas par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems
22b2(mdo sde): can 'di ni le lo can dge ba'i chos dang bral ba ste/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing sdig pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu btsal bar brtson pa la mi ngoms par
22b3(mdo sde): bya ste/ sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sngar je 'jug par byas la phyis bdeg/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du de ltar
22b4(mdo sde): go cha gyon pa 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni brjed ngas pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ nyon
22b5(mdo sde): mongs pa nges par ma bsams te/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing sdigs pa'o// bdag ni nyon mongs pa nges par bsams par bya/ dran pa dang / shes bzhin can du bya/ rtse gcig
22b6(mdo sde): tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par bya ba ste/ sems can thams cad ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ ma sbas pa/ nye bar ma zhing 'di lta bu dag gi don tu/ bdag gis go cha chen po bgos
22b7(mdo sde): te/ 'di ltar sems nges par semasu gzhug go snyam pa 'di dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa/ 
22b8(mdo sde): bdag tu smra ba/ sems can du lta bar dmigs pa'i spyod yul ba ste/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing sdigs pa'o// bdag ni chos nyid la bsten par bya'o// snyam ste/ 'di la gshe ba
23a1(mdo sde): dang / khro ba su yin zhing des yongasu tshol ba na gang gshe ba dang khro ba'i chos de mi dmigaso// de bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs par lta ba dang bral bar bzod pa 'di
23a2(mdo sde): ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho da ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngan tu brjod pa dang / ngan tu smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe
23a3(mdo sde): ba dang / bsdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las kyang mi nyams te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag
23a4(mdo sde): gi gnod pa bzod pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang bdud thams cad kyis bya chub kyi sems de las bral yang mi g.yo ba dang / pas kyi
23a5(mdo sde): rgol ba dmigs par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams ca/ da kyis yang dag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa// 'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang mi brjed pa dang
23a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu 'dug kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems de las nyams par byed mi nus te/ bdud rdzu 'phrul rab tu chen pa dag gis khyod kyi theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub
23a7(mdo sde): bar mi nus kyis/ khyod kyis gces par bya ba 'di thong shig/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyis 'di 'or cig/ byang chub ni rnyid par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rnyed par dka' ba
23a8(mdo sde): ste/ 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang du myong bar 'gyuraro// gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde ba yin gyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig/ ces de'i
23b1(mdo sde): sems skul zhing / sems dran par byed la/ blo gros rgya mtsho gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de ltar bral bar byed/ de ltar mos pa bzlog par byed kyang / sngon gyi go cha mi
23b2(mdo sde): 'dor zhing bsam pa rnam par 'khrugs pa mi byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis nges par byang chub kyi snying po gnas par bya/ bdag gis nges par bdud dpung dang bcas par bam par
23b3(mdo sde): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ bdag gis nges par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/ bdag gis nges par stong gsum
23b4(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu chos kyi gtam chen po ba rjod par bya/ bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron tug nyer la/ chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o// 
23b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems rig pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub tu bsam pa rig gis/ bdag gis thad mkhyen pa'i
23b6(mdo sde): sems kyi gnod pa bzod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang / lha rnams dang / sems can thams cad dang bdag la slu bar mi bya'o snyam pa de dag de lta bu ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub seng
23b7(mdo sde): sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing theg pa chen po de las mi byed pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
23b8(mdo sde): phyin pa'i go cha gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang ba med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnyis yong su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni byang chub se
24a1(mdo sde): // sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// byang chub lam las bsam pa mi phyed cing // de ni snying rje las kyang phyed ma
24a2(mdo sde): ma yin// bdag gis dkon mchog gsum po bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas chos rnams yang dag bsgrub par bya// sum cu rtsa gnyis khyad 'phags mtshan dang dpe byad bzang // gang dag gis ni
24a3(mdo sde): stobs bcu rnams kyi lus mdzes pa// de dag yongasu btsal phyir mchod sbyin bye ba byed// gnod pa shin tu rnam mang bzod cing yon tan phyug/ brgya phrag mtha' yas shing rnams de dag bdag
24a4(mdo sde): gis sbyang // rin chen chos mchog 'di ni bdag gis bsrung bar bya// brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can de dag bdag gis dgrol// des na gnod pa bzod cing bsam pa mi phyed// phyogs
24a5(mdo sde): bcu'i sems can khams ni mtha' yas ji snyed pa// tham sa cad 'dus par gyur nas lag na mtshon thogs te// de/ dag de la 'jig byed gshe zhing bsdigs byed kyang // yonan
24a6(mdo sde): phyin ni bsdigs dang 'phya ba bzod par byed// sngon mtha' bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas ji snyed par// de dag rgyun mi 'chad par tshig rtsub smras kyang ni// bdag nyid chen po de bzod mi khro gsha
24a7(mdo sde): ba med// de ltar rtogs pa rnams ni gnod pa dag par 'gyur// sems can de dag lag na mtshon thogs lhan cig tu// bdag gis las kyi yan lag dum bur gtubs// 'on kyang bdag gi
24a8(mdo sde): sems yin nam yang khro bar mi bya ste/ byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par 'gyur// 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung // gang du byang chub sems mchog
24b1(mdo sde): 'di dag sbyin pa dang // dul ba'i sems dang gzhan yang dkar sems mi 'dor ba// der ni de'i lus dum bu dum bur rnam par 'gyur// sems dmyal dud 'gro'i skye gnas yi dwags 'jig rten
24b2(mdo sde): mir bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas don med lus kyang gtubs// sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par 'dod pas lus 'dor zhes// skyes bu des ni yid kyang yang dag tshim par byed// mi yi sdug
24b3(mdo sde): bsngal rgyu ni rnam pa du ma dag/ mtshams med sdug bsngal brgya cher nye ba mi 'gro ba'i// dmyal ba rnamasu bskal pa brgyar ni gnas par spro// rgyal ba dang ni chos dang sems can mi gtong // 
24b4(mdo sde): bdag myi rtag ring du mi thub sgyu ma 'dra// khams bzhin de dag gdug pa'i sbrul dang 'dra bar gsungs// bdag gis lus bor byas te dug med 'gyur bar bya// nyon mongs dug
24b5(mdo sde): zhi nas ni rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur// srid gsum 'a jig rten 'di ni lus bde 'gyur ba'i gzhi// 'dod pa'i zas rgyu chung zad ji snyed 'jigs pa ste// bdag gis
24b6(mdo sde): lus btang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur bar bya// bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de dag gnod pa bzod// nag po'i phyogs la grogs ni brgya stong phrag kyang mang // dkar po'i phyogs ni gang
24b7(mdo sde): la'ang grogs po gcig pur 'gyur// bdag ni mi dge rnams dang rtsod par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas bzod pa gsung bas bzod pa bdag gi grogs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis 'dir
24b8(mdo sde): ni bdag gi dbang // ji ltar sangs rgyas sku la sems ni mi phyed// sangs rgyas dang ni bdag nyid che lha bdag gi grogs// gnod pa bzod par bya yi sdang bar mi bya'o// gnod pa lus dang
25a1(mdo sde): // ngag yid rnam pa gsum du gsungs// gang bzod pa 'bod na mi byed brjod pa yin// lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas yod bdag/ gal te lus la bzod pa
25a2(mdo sde): lus gnod dag par 'gyur// lus ni dum bu dum bur gtubasu te rnam gtor tshe// thabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid pha rol phyin rdzogs 'gyur// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson
25a3(mdo sde): 'grus bsam gtan dang // shes rab khyad 'phags dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin// lus dang lus la sreg pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyang 'dor// sbyin dang rab tu ldan pa'i pha rol
25a4(mdo sde): phyin par 'gyur// byams pas 'jig rten khyab byed tshul khrims nyams mi 'gyur// byang chub rjesu 'gro bas tshul khrims dag pa 'dzin// bzod pa'i sgribs skyed lan
25a5(mdo sde): lag rnams dang nying lag gcod// de yang de yi bzod pa/ 'i pha rol phyin la sbyor// brtson 'grus gces pa ma zhun/ bar skabs sgyid lug med// lus ni rnam par mthong
25a6(mdo sde): zhing brtson 'grus pha rol 'gro// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa dran pa mi 'dor zhing // nyon mongs mun pa'i rdul rnams bsul phyir rab tu brtson// lus bshig nas ni bsam gtan stobs dang
25a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'thob// 'di yang rdul bral bsam gtan pha rol phyin la sbyor// bdag gi lus ni bdag med rmi lam klog dang 'dra// 'di la byed pa po med tshor ba po 'ang med// lus kyi gzings
25a8(mdo sde): bas bcings pa'i sems can bdag gis dgrol// shes rab 'di ni khyad 'phags pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang zhig 'di la sbyor zhing tshul bzhin chos sems la// lus kyi gnod pa bzod
25b1(mdo sde): cing rab sdang mi byed cing // mi snyan pa dang smad dang bshud ba'i tshig thos kyang // de ni zhe sdang mi 'gyur byams ldan sems kyang dul// tha ba rab tu zhe sdang byor 'di sbyin pa dag/ byams pa'i
25b2(mdo sde): yid du gyur pa 'di ni tshul khrims dag/ bzod pa'i stobs skyed 'di ni bzod pa dag pa yin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod nas brtson 'grus phyir zhing skyed// sems dang yid rab zhi ba 'di ni
25b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan dag/ sgra skad mi rnyed 'di ni shes rab dag pa yin// mi yi tshig thos nas ni gang chos 'di sems pa// de 'dir gnod bzod dag gi skyon la chags pa med// bdud dang mu
25b4(mdo sde): stegs can gyi lta gyur brgya stong gis// gnas 'di rnyed dka' sbyor ba 'ong brjod kyang // mi skrag zhum pa med cing phyi phyir mthu skyed// mkhas pa de ni gnod dang sems gnod
25b5(mdo sde): mtha' las bzod// gang zhig bzod dang brtson 'grus ra kha gnas ri rab 'dra// sen kun nang dpa' ba de 'dir gnod ba bzod// stobs bcu rnams kyi sbyang ba dang ni gnod
25b6(mdo sde): shes nas// byang chub rjesu 'gro bas byi nas lung ston to// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i 'bigs pa gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang
25b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che des rlom semasu mo byed/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
25b8(mdo sde): sems de la rten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ spros par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed kyi/ rnam par rtog pa nye ba ba ni ba la gnas pa yin te/ 
26a1(mdo sde): de chos zab mo rnams la blos dpyod// chos zab mo dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lug su 'byung ba dang / rgyu la dmigs pa khong du chud pa dbus pas mi
26a2(mdo sde): dag chad pa ma yin pa dang / mthar lta ba dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang / bdag ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba
26a3(mdo sde): dang stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la so ma nyi med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang / shin tu mi rtag
26a4(mdo sde): ba nyid dang gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / tsher bu rgya bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang / 'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs ste/ gnyi su med pa nyid dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing dang
26a5(mdo sde): mtshungs par sa sor rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgyusalta bu'i chos nyid dang / khams rnams g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / skye mched rnams phan tshun du shes pa med pa nyid
26a6(mdo sde): dang sems gnas pa med pa dang / nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med pa dang / 
26a7(mdo sde): ro gcig dang / bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / lAm gyi tshogs shes pa yongasu tshol ba dang / nges pa'i don la rtog pa dang / don gyi rje su zhugs pa'i blo dang / skad thad/ 
26a8(mdo sde): la skad med par 'jug pa dang / sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongasu chad pa shes pa dang / don dang tshig 'bru gnyi su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod med par
26b1(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa shin tu zad pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa med pa dang / lam shes pa 'dus byas
26b2(mdo sde): dang / 'dus ma byas mnyam nyid du 'jug pa dang / lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar 'pho ba med pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang / 'jig par
26b3(mdo sde): mi gnas pa dang / sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa dmigs pa la shin tu brtag pa dang / chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa/ chos kyi dbyings dbyings ma yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba
26b4(mdo sde): mnyam pas mnyam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / dad pa' stabs gzhan
26b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang na bas nges par byung ba dang / dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med ba dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa
26b6(mdo sde): dang / shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang / dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtog pa med pa dang / dran pa'i stob
26b7(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs sems par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
26b8(mdo sde): dran pa med cing brjed pa med pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan
27a1(mdo sde): lag len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dpa' rlabs med pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus dang
27a2(mdo sde): sems la zhugs pa dang / ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag
27a3(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba lta ba thams cad spang ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / yongasu rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i ngag sgra skad thams cad mnyam pa
27a4(mdo sde): nyid la 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' lus dang sems kyi les dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba tshe la ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol
27a5(mdo sde): ba 'deg pa med cing 'jog pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i dri na ba dge ba dang rnam par rig pa la mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin sems kyi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la
27a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / zhi ba zhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang / lhag mthong lta bas rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba med pa'i don mi rtag pa dang / gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i don sdug bsngal gyi don dang / rgyub
27a7(mdo sde): med pa'i don bdag med pa'i don dang / nye bar zhi ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang / dul bas sbyin pa dang / bsil ba'i dngos por gyur pa'i tshul khrims dang / zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang / shin
27a8(mdo sde): tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nang nye bar zhi ba'i bsam gtan dang / yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab dang / sems gdod ma nas rnam
27b1(mdo sde): par dag pa'i byams pa dang / namakha' dang mtshungs pa'i snying rje dang / dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsod pa thams cad rgyun gcod pa'i btang snyoms dang / chos thams cad 'khor gsum
27b2(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' nas stong pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba na bdag med pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun chad pa/ tshig 'bru dang bral
27b3(mdo sde): ba na mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'di dag rtog pa dang khong du chud pa dang / 'jug pa dang shes pa la dpyod pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / 'grang ba dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / nan tan byed pa
27b4(mdo sde): 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de 'bigs pa'o// de ltar thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de phigs na/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba ni lhun gyi
27b5(mdo sde): grub pa nyid du 'thob par 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di// lta ste dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gnal med khong lhun kyis grub par rnam par rgyu zhing / 'dzam+bu'i gling thang du
27b6(mdo sde): snang bar byed kyang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba 'di snyam du bdag cag 'gro 'am 'on te ldog snyam du mi sems par sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas de dag
27b7(mdo sde): 'gro'o// blo gos rgya mtsho de bzhin du rab tu phigs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag na sems can
27b8(mdo sde): gyi don byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni yang mngon par 'du byed pa med par bya ba de dag kun tu ston to// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'bigs pa shes pa gang yin pa
28a1(mdo sde): de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yongasu btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag
28a2(mdo sde): nar lhag mthong gis chos rnams mthong gi/ mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni ma yin// de'i lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni shes rab ste/ shes rab des mngon par du 'gyur zhe na/ 
28a3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon sum du 'gyuraro// chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na// rnam par rig pa de'i yang dag pa ji lta ba ba/ mnyam nyid
28a4(mdo sde): kyi gzhi de las kun tu mi spyod pa chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par rig pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'o// rnam par rig pa de'i yang dag pa'i
28a5(mdo sde): ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// gang gi tshe tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe snang bar yang
28a6(mdo sde): mi byedadang mi snang bar yang mi byed do// de la snang ba ni gang mi snang ba ni gang zhe na/ snang ba zhes bya ba ni skyo ba'o// mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni 'gags pa'o// gang gi tshe snang bar yang mi byed/ 
28a7(mdo sde): mi snang bar yang mi byed pa de'i tshe/ skye bar yang mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed// gang gi tshe skye bar yang mi byed/ 'gag par mi byed pa de'i tshe chos nyid la gnas pa yin te/ chos kyi
28a8(mdo sde): dbyings 'khrug par mi byed/ de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig par mi byed// de la chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rje su rtogs pa'o// de
28b1(mdo sde): bzhin nyid ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyi su med pa'i yang dag pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar mngon sum du shes pa rig pa'i byang
28b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shin tu phigs pa shes pa zhes bya'o// sbyang ba dang / gnod pa dang / nges par 'bigs pa'i le'u 'di/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshad pa'i tshe/ 
28b3(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// srog chags khri drug stong gis bzod pa rab tu thob par
28b4(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshog su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// chos kun nges par rtogs pa yi// byang chub sems ni sgrogs par byed// de tshe nges rtogs ye shes kyi
28b5(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la chags pa med// zab mo'i chos rnams khong du chud// mkhas pa skrag par 'gyur ba med// skrag med kun tu 'jigs med pas// khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin// 
28b6(mdo sde): rgyu la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ni brten pa'i chos rnams khong du chud// shes rab ldan de rjes 'thun byed// mthar lta ba ni mi 'dzin to// rtag pa dang ni chad pa la// blo ni thogs pa yod ma
28b7(mdo sde): yin// yang dag mtha' ni bsam yas pa'i// dbu ma'i mtha' ni rtogs par 'gyur// bdag gi mtha' yi rang bzhin gyis// chos rnams bdag med ngo bo nyid// chos kun de yi rang bzhin te// 
28b8(mdo sde): gdod nas ma skyes 'gag pa med// skyes pa med cing 'byung ba med// stong pa gzung med dri ma med// mtshan ma med cing spros pa med// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra// de dag sems
29a1(mdo sde): kyi mi smon par// 'dod cing chags pa med par spangs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin mngon sum du// lbu ba lta bur rab tu shes/ tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba ste// 'du shes skrag
29a2(mdo sde): rgyu'i mtshan nyid do// 'du byed chu shing snying po 'dra// rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra// khams bzhi g.yo ba med pa te// na mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin// gang dag skye mched thams cad
29a3(mdo sde): ninibems po phan tshun spyod yulo// sems ni nang na ma yin te// phyi rol tu yang mi dmigaso// yid la nga yi yod ma yin// rnam par shes pa gnas pa med// chos rnams yid la
29a4(mdo sde): myi byed// lhag par byed pa rnam par spong // chos rnams thams ci da mnyam nyid du// yang dag nyid du khong du chud// tha dad med cing ro gcig ste// gcig pu bgrod lam
29a5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid// lam gyi shes pa rab tu rtogs// nges pa'i na gyi don rnams mthong // blo ni don gyi rjesu zhugs// skad ni skad med khong du chud// sgra rnams kun la
29a6(mdo sde): sngon mtha' dang // phyi ma'i mtha' mar yongasu gcod// don dang tshig 'bru rnams la mkhas// chos rnams gnyis med par rtogs// brjod du med pa'i don la ni// 'di nyid yang dag
29a7(mdo sde): khong du chud// skye ba med par sdug bsngal shes// kun 'byung ba la mnyam pa'i blo// 'gog pa shes pa zad par bstan// lam shes pa ni 'dus ma byas// lus dang tshor ba sems
29a8(mdo sde): dang ni// chos la cho su rje su rtogs// dran med yid la byed med pa'i// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyings min par// yang dag nyid ni mnyam pas mnyam// spong
29b1(mdo sde): sa spang du med pa ni// yang dag spong ba rab tu brtan// sems la dbang ni thob pa yin// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab tu bstan// chags pa kun las rab 'das pa// de ni dad pa'i dbang po yin// chas
29b2(mdo sde): rnams thams cad rnam dbyen pa// de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin// dran pa med pa'i dran 'jug pa// de ni dran pa'i dbang po yin// chos rnams yid la mi byed pa// de ni ting 'dzin
29b3(mdo sde): dbang po yin// spros las shin tu rab 'das pa// da ni shes rab dbang po yin// yang dag nyid ni rtogs nas de// gzhan gyi dad pas 'gro ma yin// sems ni g.yo ba yod min pa// da
29b4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// yang dag shes las nyams pa med// dran pa'i stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// ting 'dzin gyi stobs mdzad ni// nges par sems la dga' ba yin// mi rtogs rnam par mi
29b5(mdo sde): rtog pa// shes rab stobs ni 'di 'dra'o// chos rnams rtogs pa'i// don du ni// byang chub yan lag rab tu bstan// mnyam ste/ mi mnyam med pa'i chos// yang dag lta ba yin
