107b3(mdo sde): rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin las mi g.yo bar bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo bar byed/ de sgrim pa med cing lhun gyis grub par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sngo'o// sngon thabs
107b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pas yongasu bsngos pa des theg pa gzhan du mi ltung zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / langs kyang rung ste/ brgya lam na yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
107b5(mdo sde): bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur mi srid// blo gro sa rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ gaN+DI'i sgra la
107b6(mdo sde): gnas par byas te snyoms par zhugs na/ gaN+DI'i sgra de de'i 'gog pa la yang mi gnas ma 'brel mod kyi/ gaN+DI'i sgra nges 'gog pa las ldang // blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang
107b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po la gnas par byas te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab par bya/ 
107b8(mdo sde): yangasu dgrol bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi rnam par mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa/ sems can thams cad la khyad par byas nas/ zab pa zab mor snang ba sems dang yid dang rnam
108a1(mdo sde): par shes pa mi rgyu ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang / de sngon sems can rab tu thar par bya ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas pa de dang ldan pas/ nyan thos
108a2(mdo sde): kyi sar mi ltung / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis tingange 'dzin de las langs nas yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing / sems
108a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ltar zhi ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol
108a4(mdo sde): bar mi ltung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu sbyangs pa byed pa'i khyad par la ltos// blo gros rgya ma/ tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gnyis shig yod la/ de la mi
108a5(mdo sde): gcig ni bdag rdo rje'i go cha bgos nas/ me 'bar ba'i nang du mtshangs// mi gcig shos ni bdag rtswa dang sog ma'i go tsha bgos nas/ me 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs na/ blo gros rgya mtsho
108a6(mdo sde): 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de gnyis las gang tshig par 'gyur/ gang tshig par mi 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi gang rdo rje'i go cha 'tshal nas zhugs 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs
108a7(mdo sde): pa de ni/ rdo rje'i go cha des yongasu bsrungs pas/ zhugs kyi nang du mchis kyang mi tshi go/ bcom ldan 'das mi gang rtswa dang sog ma'i go cha 'tshal nas zhugs 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs pa de ni/ 
108a8(mdo sde): der mchongs ma thag tu tshig par 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ran dang sog ma ni 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid lags te/ zhugs kyi 'tshig pa bsrung mi bzod// bcom ldan
108b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar rdo rje'i go cha bgos pa'i ming me'i nang du song yang mi tshig pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po dang / snying rje'i go cha
108b2(mdo sde): dang lhag pa'i bsam pa sra ba'i rdo rje'i go cha bgos nas/ sems can rab tu thar par bya bar dmigs pa la gnas te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
108b3(mdo sde): med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar rtog pa yang btang la/ zhi ba'i ting 'dzin de la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
108b4(mdo sde): nges par gyur pa la yang mi 'jug/ 'bras bu 'thob par yang mi byed par/ ting nge 'dzin de la yang myong zhing zil gyis mnan te/ yang ma nyams ma snang bar ldang // langs nas kyang sangs
108b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong // sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed// blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar rtsa/ dang sog ma'i go cha bgos pa'i mi de mchongs ma thag tu
108b6(mdo sde): mes tshig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtsho nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa srid pa la kun tu 'bar bar lta ste/ sems can rnams yal bar bor
108b7(mdo sde): nas/ snying rje chen po dang bral te/ zhi ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin la reg nas gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med/ gang brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba de ni gnas mdo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
108b8(mdo sde): nyan thos ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma bsags pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bstsags pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
109a1(mdo sde): thams cad yong su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bar skabasu yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed// blo gros rgya mcho lba bas na/ byang chub sems dpas
109a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'i chos thams cad la me 'bar ba lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed
109a3(mdo sde): la chos de dag la yang so sor brtag par bya/ chos de dag shes pa la rnam par dpyad par bya/ zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du mi bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na/ byang chub
109a4(mdo sde): sems dpas yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos zab mo rnams la yang spyod la/ bar skabasu yod
109a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mngon sum du mi byed// blo gros rgya mtsho mo ngasu bsngo ba zhes bya ba ci la bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po de nyid la sems gzhol ba dang / 'dun
109a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par phyogs pa dang / yongasu phyogs pa ste/ theg pa gzhan du ma yin pa'o// de'i phyir yongasu bsngo ba zhes bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na/ rdza mkhan gyis 'jim
109a7(mdo sde): ba'i gong bu 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag kyang bskor na snod kyi ming mi thob ste/ 'jim pa'i gong bu nyid kyi grangasu 'gre'o// gang gi tshe bskor bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ snod kyi ming 'gro'o// 
109a8(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mang po bstsags pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi
109b1(mdo sde): 'thob kyi/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos par gyur pa de'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'tho'o// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser dul ma'i gar bu
109b2(mdo sde): yongasu ma bsgyur na rgyan gyi ming mi thob ste/ gser gyi gar bu nyid kyi grangasu 'gro'o// de nyid yongasu bskur na rgyan gyi mi 'tho'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
109b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongasu ma bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob kyi/ de nyid yongasu bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'gro'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na byang chub
109b4(mdo sde): sems dpas rtag par rgyan tu 'dres pa med pa'i yid kyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// thams ca mkhyen pa nyid du
109b5(mdo sde): yongasu bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos zab mo rna// mas la yang spyod la/ bar skabasu yang dag pa'i mtha/ 'a mngon sum du mi byed// yongasu bsngo ba
109b6(mdo sde): le'u zhes bya ste// dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
109b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gang 'khrul pa 'di snyed cig srung yang 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba ni bgyi dka' bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
109b8(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thabs kyis ni/ byang chub seng bsam gtan dang / 
110a1(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / tinge 'dzin dang / snoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs kyang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang
110a2(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'khrul par mi 'gyur te/ thabs mkhas pa nges bgyi ba thams cad kyang ston la/ bgyi bar ltung bar yang mi 'gyur/ chos mnyam pa nyid la yang
110a3(mdo sde): gnas la/ sems can log pa nyid mchis pa rnams la yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa'i sladadu/ chos kyang ston cing bsam pa yongasu ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bdag nges par gyur
110a4(mdo sde): ba der yang mi lhung // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtshod de bzhino// ji skad
110a5(mdo sde): smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad// thabs la mkhas pa 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
110a6(mdo sde): byang chub yod kyi/ thabs la mi mkhas pa la ni byang chub med// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snod gcig gi nang du tshon sna gsum ste/ sna gcig ni kha dog sngon po/ sna
110a7(mdo sde): gcig ni kha dog dmar po/ sna gcig ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur ser po blugs la tshan gyi snod gcig pu der ras kha bsgyur ba gsum ste/ gcig ni ras shog po yug sngon
110a8(mdo sde): po kha bsgyur ba/ gcig ni ras phran yug dmar por kha bsgyur ba/ gcig ni res gtses bu rin thang med pa/ ser po gser gyi kha dog lta bur kha bsgyur ba/ zung gcig bcu sa
110b1(mdo sde): la de dag snod gcig gi nang du bcug te/ bsrubs na/ ji ltar kha bsgyur ba'i bye brag bzhin du tshon 'dzin te/ gang tshon sngon pos kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog sngon por 'gyur/ gang
110b2(mdo sde): tshon dmar por kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog dmar po 'gyur/ gang tshen ser po gser lta bus kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog ser po gser lta bur 'gyur yang / snod de la ni rnam par rtog par
110b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yang med// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i snod gcig la gang zag gsum ste/ gcig ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa/ gcig
110b4(mdo sde): ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba/ gcig ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa btsud la/ de dag gtsud pa dang / gang gis ci 'dra ba'i bsam pa dang / sems kyi tshon bsags
110b5(mdo sde): pa de 'dra bar de ye shes kyi tshon yong su 'dzin kyang / ste/ nga ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ 'i snod la ni/ rnam par rtog pa gang yang me // de la ras
110b6(mdo sde): shog po'i yug lta bur ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa blta'o// ras bran gyi yug lta bur ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa blta'o// rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu'i zung lta bur ni/ 
110b7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa blta'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos rnams ni snying po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ 
110b8(mdo sde): bdag po med pa ste/ 'di ltar ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar rnam par sgrub ste/ rnam par bsgrubs kyang sems pa ma yin/ rab tu rtag pa ma yin pa la ltos/ bla gres rgya mtsho ches
111a1(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrub pa 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos gang la yang yongasu skyo ba mi skyed// de de ltar ye shes mthong ba shin tu rnam
111a2(mdo sde): par dag pa yin te/ 'dir gang la yang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa mi byed// de ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab shes pa ni/ snying rje chen po'i go cha de yang mi
111a3(mdo sde): 'dor ro// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya rin thang med pa shin tu byang ba/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ shim tu dri ma med pa/ rdzab kyi nang du bcug
111a4(mdo sde): nas lo skyong lon pa/ de lo stong 'das nas rdzab de nas phyung ste/ bkrus shing yongasu sbyangs te/ bye ra byas na shin tu dag cing shin tu yongasu dag la shin tu sbyangs nas/ de nyi
111a5(mdo sde): dag pa dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin mo 'doro// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sem sa dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin
111a6(mdo sde): gyis 'od gsal bar rab tu shes la/ de yang blo bu ra gyi rke ba'i nyon mongs pas/ nyon mongs pa can du bya sa par mthong // de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
111a7(mdo sde): sems te/ nyon mongs pa 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa med kyi/ nyon mongs pa de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brta
111a8(mdo sde): ba la byung du zad pas/ bdag gis sems can de dag gi blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan mi nuso snyam nas/ de zhum pa'i sems mi skyed kyi de de bas kyang shas
111b1(mdo sde): cher sems can thams cad kyi rab tu thar bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa bskyed// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ nyon mongs pa de dag la ni stobs dang mthu chung zad kyang med/ nyon mongs/ 
111b2(mdo sde): ba de dag ni stobs med pa nyam chung ba dag go/ de dag ni yang dag pa la chung zad kyang mi gnas kyis/ nyon mongs pa de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dag ste/ de dag
111b3(mdo sde): la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na 'khrugs par mi 'gyur bas/ bdag gis de dag la ci nas kyang yang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtag
111b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o// nyon mongs pa rnams dang mi 'dre ba ni log ngas pa yin gyi 'dre ba ni ma yin// gal te bdag nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dre bar gyur na/ nyon mongs pa'i bcing bas
111b5(mdo sde): bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir/ ji ltar chos bstan gyis bad gnyon mongs pa rnams dang mi 'dre bar byas la/ nyon
111b6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// bdag sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang dag 'khor ba'i rgyun byed la/ dge
111b7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag dang ni 'dre bar bya'o snyamo// 'khor ba'i rgyun byed la dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag gang zhe na/ 
111b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs yongasu btsal bas mi ngoms pa dang / bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongasu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang phrad bar smon pa dang / sems can
112a1(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba la yongasu mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brtson pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la spro ba dang / chos
112a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i bag la zhal mi 'dor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba rnams yongasu mi gtong ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa
112a3(mdo sde): rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'dra yang / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnam spyi mi gos// blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba lags na/ 
112a4(mdo sde): ci'i slad du nyon mongs pa rnams shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ltar nyon mongs pa de lta bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpapa sa gron
112a5(mdo sde): gsum pa ni nyon mongs pa las byung ba yin pa/ sa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhanyes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas bsams
112a6(mdo sde): bzhin du khams gsum dang 'dre'o// de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste/ khams gsum du 'dre bas de skad bya'i sems rede bar nyon
112a7(mdo sde): mongs pas ni ma yin// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon khyim bdag cig la bu sdug pa phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ blta ba dang / 'thun pa gcig pu zhig yod par gyur
112a8(mdo sde): la/ khye'u de yang byis par gyur pas gar byed bzhin du khron pa phyis khung rtsog pa zhig tu ltung ba dang / de nas khye'u de'i ma dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dag gis khye'u de khron pa brtsog par
112b1(mdo sde): ltung bar mthong la/ mthong nas kyang sgra chen phyung ste/ mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi/ khron pa 'acos pa der bzhugs te/ bu gcig pa de mi 'byin la/ de nas khye'u byor
112b2(mdo sde): 'ongs te/ des bu gcig pa khron pa brtsog par lhung ba de mthong la/ mthong nas kyang bu gcig pa la bsam pa thag pa nas byams shing rje su chags pas mi smod par myur du
112b3(mdo sde): skyen par la gor du khron pa brtsog pa der zhugs te/ bu gcig pa phyung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho ji tsam du don shes par bya ba'i phyir/ dper byas pa yino// 'dir
112b4(mdo sde): don tu blta ba gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho khon pa brdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum gyi tshig blang gso// bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad
112b5(mdo sde): kyi tshig bla dgas te/ de dag la byang chub se/ mas dpa' bu gcig pa ltar 'du sheso// ma dang mdza 'bashes dang / nye du zhes bya ba de ni/ nyan thos dang / 
112b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig bla dwags te/ de dag ni 'khor bar lhung ba'i sems can rnams mthong na/ mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi 'byin
112b7(mdo sde): ni mi nus// tshong dpon khyim bdag ces bya ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dwags te/ de ni sems dag cing dri ma med/ dri ma dang bral la 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon
112b8(mdo sde): sum du gyur kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du khams gsum du mtshams sbyor// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
113a1(mdo sde): snying rje chen po ste/ gang nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad las shin tu longasu grol yang thabs mkhas pas srid par skye ba nye bar len la/ shes
113a2(mdo sde): rab kyis yongasu zin pas rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa med cing / nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston
113a3(mdo sde): ba'ong byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dri ma ma mchis shing dri ma dang bral te/ de dag kyang 'khor ba la mi
113a4(mdo sde): smod cing / chos zab mo la ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas kyang / 'dus ma byasu mau ltung zhing 'bras bu yang thob par mi bgyid pa ni/ bgyi dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
113a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni byang chub/ sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag gnyis dang rab tu lnga na ba'i lam ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113a6(mdo sde): dang thabs la mkhas pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te/ dag par gyur pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
113a7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la mi smod cing / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba yang 'dzin pa 'di ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// blo gros rgya
113a8(mdo sde): mtsho gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
113b1(mdo sde): ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang gi tshe snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis/ 'dus ma byas mi ltung 'bras bu
113b2(mdo sde): thob par yang mi byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ tha dad du
113b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa/ sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de/ mya
113b4(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas/ mnyam pa nyid
113b5(mdo sde): la 'jug pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o// gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams khams gcig tu rab tu shes shing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyang
113b6(mdo sde): mngon sum du mi byed la/ sems can gyi khams la lta bas/ chos kyi dbyings la lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sbyin pa
113b7(mdo sde): dag pa ni/ shes rab bo// yongasu sngo ba dag pa ni thab so// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dag pa ni shes rabo// yongasu bsngo ba dag pa ni
113b8(mdo sde): thab so// mdor bsdu na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dag pa ni shes rag// yongasu bsngo ba dag pa ni thab so// blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sede'i dge ba'i
114a1(mdo sde): rtsa ba yong su dag pa ni gang lags/ yongasu bsngo ba dag pa ni gang lags/ shes rab dag pa ni gang lags/ thabs dag pa ni gang lags/ bcom
114a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ blo gros rgya mtsho dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni gang bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag
114a3(mdo sde): tu lta ba dang bralar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sogs pa'o// yongasu bsde ba dag pa ni gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongasu 'dris par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub
114a4(mdo sde): tu yongasu bsngo ba'o// shes rab dag pa ni gang sems can tham sa cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i sheso// thabs dag pa ni gang sems can thams cad
114a5(mdo sde): la so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa'o// blo rga sa rgya mtsho gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa bdag pa ni gang srid pa ra 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par dge
114a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sogs pa'o// yong su bsngo ba dag pa ni gang / theg pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la byed pa dang bral
114a7(mdo sde): bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag theg pa chen por yongasu sngo ba'o// shes rab dag pa niH/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa'o// thabs dag
114a8(mdo sde): ba ni sems can gang dag pa yong su smin par byed pa de dag don 'thun pas theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa'o// gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ longs
114b1(mdo sde): spyod mi zad pa dang / lug na rin po che'o// yongasu bsngo ba dag pa ni gang / sems can thams cad dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad tu chu mam ma mam sa
114b2(mdo sde): jug ga pa gag tsu rgya nas sa rgyas kyi gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin cing chud mi za bar byed pa'o// thabs dag pa ni gang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / spobs po tshogs pa med pa
114b3(mdo sde): dang / chos bstan pa don yod pas legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang dag pa ni gang / tshe rabs tshe rabs
114b4(mdo sde): ngag tu byang chub kyi sems dmi brjed pa'o// yongasu bsngo ba/ dag pa ni gang byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yangs
114b5(mdo sde): bsngo'o// shes rab dag pa ni gang / mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de byang chub semasu shes pa'o// thabs pa gab ni byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid pha rol
114b6(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
114b7(mdo sde): ba'i don ji ltar bdag gi 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
114b8(mdo sde): dag pa rnams kyi byang chub ni kun tu 'gro ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub ma lags pa'i chos gang yang ma mchiso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ches thams cad
115a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa ni byang chubo/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes mi bgyi'o// yul drug po dag gi
115a2(mdo sde): nang nas chos gang de la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa ni byang chub// bcom ldan 'das de ltar mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs mkhas pa dag
115a3(mdo sde): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs byan te zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya
115a4(mdo sde): mtsho legs leg so// de de bzhi no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ yul drug po dag gi nang nas chos gang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
115a5(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa rnams la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang / dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa ni/ byang chub ste// blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig
115a6(mdo sde): par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs
115a7(mdo sde): ba med pa gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ skar mdog gi bskal pa la shin tu sprul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
115a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas shes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi
115b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung // ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas shes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de thams cad
115b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa ma thob cing / byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ lus las 'od 'di lta bu phyung ste/ 'od rab tu byung ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs
115b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med 'grang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir mi ldog pa
115b4(mdo sde): dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'khod pa de dag gi/ nyes/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de mthong // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
115b5(mdo sde): de ga la bde log su me tog dag gtor to// gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus la ba'o// me tog de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
115b6(mdo sde): shin tu sprul pa der mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyi me tog bkram pa gcig tu gnas par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha gang dag dang / 
115b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ 'od de mthong nas/ gang 'di lta bu rnam par dag pa'i 'od byung ba las na/ kye ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang
115b8(mdo sde): bo mtha' yasu 'gyur zhes/ ched du brjod pa che du brjod/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur
116a1(mdo sde): tong ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu sprul pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams den 'khod pa'i mi de dag gi longs spyod dang yong su spyad ban/ 
116a2(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongasu spyad pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khamasde shin tu sprul pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir
116a3(mdo sde): bskal pa de skar mdog ces bya zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho bskal pa khri 'das nas/ bskal pa de la sangs rgyas byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba zhes
116a4(mdo sde): bya ba byung // gang gi 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des byang chub thob bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gyis/ bskal pade
116a5(mdo sde): skar mdog ces bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcu bzhi byung // blo ga/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu sprul pa de ni
116a6(mdo sde): 'byor pa/ rgyas pa zhi ba/ lo legs pa/ lha dang mis gang pa yangs shing tha gru che bar gyur te/ gling bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu cu rtsa drug yod// gling re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad brgya stong
116a7(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod// dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi re re la yang grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yong bar gyur to// grong khyer re re yang grong dang / tshong dus dang / 'o
116a8(mdo sde): gyi grong brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas bskor bar gyur to// grong khyer de dag thams cad na yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu bcu yod par gyur to// grong dang / 
116b1(mdo sde): tshong 'dus dang / 'or gyi grong de dag thams cad na yang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad brgyad gnas par gyur to// dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i mi rnams la smos
116b2(mdo sde): kyang ci dgos te/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de rgyas par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni gser dang dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rin po che sna bzhi las grub par gyur to// 
116b3(mdo sde): de na gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / yongasu spyod pa dag bas wa~M gyis 'byor to// lha dang mi de dag kyang nga'i ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med par gyur to// bcom
116b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub par gyur to// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po ni/ nyan thos bye ba brgya stong
116b5(mdo sde): phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod// byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phra ga bcu gnyi su yod// rgyal po pho brang grong khyer
116b6(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku skye ba'i sar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de de nas mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer chen po
116b7(mdo sde): dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gnas te bzhugs so// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na/ grong khyer chen po dga' ba 'byung ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul shin tu rnam
116b8(mdo sde): bar dag pa zhes bya ba/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung // de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo
117a1(mdo sde): rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bduno// 
117a2(mdo sde): rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sems can thams cad la
117a3(mdo sde): sems zhe 'gras pa med pa'o// rgya le yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ni bye ba phrag bzhi yod/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzun
117a4(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang drag par zhugs pa sha sta go/ dal bu stong yod// dpa' ba// rdul pod pa/ yan lag bzang po mchog gi
117a5(mdo sde): gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ sre da med kyi bu'i stobs kyis shugs phyed bdog pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis yan lag
117a6(mdo sde): rnam par smras pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go// de la bu mo brgyad 'bum yod/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa
117a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo'i gzugs 'dra ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha sta go/ blo gros rgya mtsho rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pas/ bac+doM sa
117a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas pa de 'khor dang bcas pa la bar gyi bskal pa gnyis kyi bar du rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa/ dge sbyong dang 'thun pa yid du 'ong ba'i gos dang / 
117b1(mdo sde): zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis spyan drangs par gyur to// rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa'i phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams yangs shing
117b2(mdo sde): thag gru che ba/ chu zheng dpag tshad lnga 'bum yod pa/ sa phyogs nor bu rin po che bai DUr+yas spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir bskor ba/ tsan dan dmar po dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po
117b3(mdo sde): gshibs te sbyar ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang 'dra bar byas// gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sa ya byaso// blo gros
117b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho de ltar rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa las gzhan mi byed par rgyun tu tshangs par spyad pa yang dag par blangs/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga yongasu bzung ste/ 
117b5(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ rang gi skye bo dang bcas/ g.yo ga 'khor dang bcas pas bar gyi bskal pa gnyisu bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ bar gyi
117b6(mdo sde): bskal pa de gnyis 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos
117b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
117b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/ 
118a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du mchi ngas de la ma chags pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
118a2(mdo sde): dpa' blo mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan pa rnams legs/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab yong su dag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji
118a3(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring du yang lta la rtsa ba yang ma chad pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul yang 'byor la bag mchis pa
118a4(mdo sde): yang mi 'dor ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrags pa rnams logs/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
118a5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams shes bgyi/ blo dgras rgya mtshos de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
118a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des/ rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la
118a7(mdo sde): yid la zung shig dang bshad// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po la gzhon gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
118a8(mdo sde): mos pa las nges par byung ba'i dad pa 'bags pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus 'bar bas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la brtson pa dang / shin
118b1(mdo sde): tu rnam par brtag pa'i blos/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par brtson pa// so so rang gis shes pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad nges par rtog pa'i
118b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag ldan na/ theg pa gzhan chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yino// rgyal po
118b3(mdo sde): chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ khyad par du 'gro bas de la ma chags pa rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems la su rung bas pas
118b4(mdo sde): gtan las ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ gzhan la bde ba rab tu sbyin pas bdag bde ba la mi chags pa rnams yin/ snying rje chen po la rab tu gnas
118b5(mdo sde): shing byams pa chen po la gnas pa rnams yin/ gong nas gong ma'i khyad par 'dod pas rgya chen po la mos pa rnams yin te/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
118b6(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ khyad par du 'gro bas de la ma chags pa rnams yin// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ blo
118b7(mdo sde): mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan pa rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i bsam pa dang / bsam pa yong su dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba las mi ldog pa'i byasam
118b8(mdo sde): ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ma bor bar bsgrub pa ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ blo mi g.yo 'gyur zhing shin tu brtan
119a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs dang shes rab yongasu dag pa rnams yino// 
119a2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la bdag med par yang mthong la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed pa dang chos thams cad
119a3(mdo sde): brjod med par yang rab tu shes la/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston cing dam pa'i chos kyang yong su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas thang
119a4(mdo sde): chos kyi skus rab tu bye bar yang mos la/ mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ btson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas
119a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad la na mkha'i ngo bo nyid du yang rtogs la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par bya ba'i/ phyir brtsal ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod pa te/ rgyal po chen po
119a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ thabs dang shes rab yong su dag pa rnams yino// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'
119a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyang ring du yang lta la/ rtsa ba yang ma chad pa rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi snying po la yang lta la/ byang chub kyi sems
119a8(mdo sde): kyang mi 'dor ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang lha la/ rang gi shes pas kyang zhum pa med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la yang lta la/ ji
119b1(mdo sde): ltar thos pa'i chos bstan pas kyang yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la yang lha la/ tshe dang 'chi 'bo dang skye ba la mi smod pa rnams yin te/ 
119b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po dri dag dang ldan na/ rgyang ring du yang lta zhing rtsa ba yang ma chad pa rnams yin// rgyal po chen po byang chub
119b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yul yang 'byor la/ bag yod pa yang mi 'dor ba rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ mi yong su smin par bya ba
119b4(mdo sde): phyir/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por yang 'gyur la/ 'du byed la mi rtag par so sor rtog pas yul 'a byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ lha
119b5(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du yang 'gyur la/ 'du byed la snga ga bsngal bar so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag
119b6(mdo sde): med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bdud nyid nye bar ston la/ chos la bdag med par so sor rtog pas/ yul 'byor
119b7(mdo sde): kyang / bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ tshangs ris kyi lha yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ tshangs pa dbang sgyur du yang gyur la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar
119b8(mdo sde): rtog pas/ yul 'byor kyang / bdag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ yul yang
120a1(mdo sde): 'byor la/ bag yod pa yang mi 'dor ba rnams yin// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don zab ma 'tshul
120a2(mdo sde): mi skrag pa rnams yino// bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag phyi rol du mi byed par rgyan tu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zab mo 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa la
120a3(mdo sde): sten pa dang / mdo sde zab mo tshul 'di lta bu de dag mnyan pa'i phyir/ dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la tshul bzhin du dpyod pa dang / don la rton pa yin
120a4(mdo sde): gyi/ tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams
120a5(mdo sde): yino/  rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems da pa' yang dag pa rnams shes bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 
120a6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
120a7(mdo sde): cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa la brtson pa'i stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongasu 'dzin pa la yongasu mi skyo bar brtson pas bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi chogs
120a8(mdo sde): sogs pa ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams shes bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na bcom
120b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas nges bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad na/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
120b2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed// dge slong bye ba phrag brgyad len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro lo// rgyal po gzhon nu de dag dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / rgyal po'i
120b3(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor ni chu ngu'i rje su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa skyeso// rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa ni rno ba'i rjesu 'thun pa'i cho sa la bzod pa skyeso// de nas rgyal po yul shin tu
120b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rgya srid thams cad bcom ldan 'das de la yongasu spyad pa'i phyir phu'o// 
120b5(mdo sde): bam po dgu pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di
120b6(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis yongasu spung ba'i phyir/ rgyal srid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la phul zin na/ rgyal po chen po khyed dad pas legs
120b7(mdo sde): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni don che
120b8(mdo sde): ba/ phan yon che ba/ rgya che ba'o// rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa chen po ni/ nyi shu po 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i
121a1(mdo sde): 'thob pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dgo/ nyi shu po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal srid dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug 'dor bas
121a2(mdo sde): nga'i ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med pa 'thob pa dang / khyim nas 'byung ba la gzhol bas nyon mongs pa las 'byung ba 'thob pa dang / ngur smrig 'dzin pas rnyog pa med pa'i sems
121a3(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pas dgang sla ba dang / gso sla ba 'thob pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa yang dag par len pas 'dod pa che ba dang / 
121a4(mdo sde): sdig pa 'dod pa spong ba 'thob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu dag pas lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa dang // byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa
121a5(mdo sde): drug 'thob pa dang / dgon pa dben pa na gnas pas 'du 'dzi dang mi 'dre ba 'thob pa dang / gnod pa med pas/ chos sems pa'i bde ba 'thob pa dang / bsam gtan
121a6(mdo sde): gyi yan lag yang dag par bsgrub pas/ sems la su rung ba 'thob pa dang / thos pa yongasu tshol ba shes rab chen po 'thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas ye shes chen po
121a7(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang / don nyung zhing byed pa nyung bas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid pas byams pa chen po 'thob pa dang / sems
121a8(mdo sde): can thams cad rab tu thar byed pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po 'thob ba dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin par 'thob pa dang / sems rab tu sbyangs pas mngangon par
121b1(mdo sde): shes pa chen po 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la so sor rtog pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa
121b2(mdo sde): 'thob pa dang / yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spyod pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa 'thob pa ste/ rgyal po chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub
121b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' la 'thob pa chen po nyi shu po 'di dag rnyed par dka' bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung shig/ 
121b4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pas rgyal srid thams cad spangs/ rgyal srid kyi
121b5(mdo sde): dpal yang spangs te/ khyim na gnas pas/ yid byung bas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig/ bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dang
121b6(mdo sde): bas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung // de rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang rab tu byung // de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal bu gzhon nu
121b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang rab tu byung // de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i bu mo gnon nu ma rnams kyang rab tu byung // de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas/ rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa'i srog chags bye
121b8(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya snying phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yang rab tu byung // de ltar de dag rab tu byung nas/ dge ba'i chos yongasu tshol ba la brtson pas brtson 'grus brtsams te gnaso// blo gros rgya mtsho
122a1(mdo sde): sems can bsod nams byas pa thams cad kyi gnasu gyur pas ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab mdzes par gyur pa la ltos/ blo gros rgya mchod nas rgyal po
122a2(mdo sde): yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de ltar rab tu byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad
122a3(mdo sde): ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang la sgrub pa snying bar bgying par gnas shing do na mchis par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms song su 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i gangams ngag dang rjesu
122a4(mdo sde): bstan pa bdag la sprul du gsoladu gro rgya mtshos deskad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das des dge slo/ nga yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
122a5(mdo sde): dge slong khyod kyi ming ni yul shin tu rnam par dgapa zhes bya'o// khyod song la rang gi yul rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ rang gi yul la tshul
122a6(mdo sde): bzhin gyis so sor rtogs shig/ ci nas kyang yul drag po de dag gi nang nas chos gang khyod la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par khong du chud pas
122a7(mdo sde): byang chub mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar so sor rtogs shig/ byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes ma byed cig/ nye ba'i 'du shes kyang ma byed cig/ blo gros rgya mtsho de nas bcom ldan 'das
122a8(mdo sde): des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la gdams ngag 'dis gdams pa dang / gcig pu dben par rtun cing shes bzhin dang ldan la bag yod par gnas te/ rang gi yul la
122b1(mdo sde): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin so sor rtogo/ de'i tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yulo// stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad
122b2(mdo sde): kyi yulo// sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yulo// rna ba'i yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yulo// stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yulo// sems can tha
122b3(mdo sde): kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yulo// de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi yul ni stong pa nyid kyi yulo// stong pa nyid kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yulo// sems
122b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul// mig yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yulo// mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yulo// sems can tham
122b5(mdo sde): cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yu lo// yid kyi bar gyi yul ni mtshan ma med pa'i yul// / mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni/ sems can thams cad
122b6(mdo sde): kyi yulo// sems can thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yulo// de bzhin du mig gi yul ni rmad med pa'i yulo// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yulo// ma
122b7(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / ma byung ba'i yulo// ma byung ba'i yul ni sems can thams cad kyi yu'o// sems can thams cad kyang ma byung ba'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yulo// de bzhin du
122b8(mdo sde): yid kyi bar gyi yul dang sbyor/ blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa yul la 'jug pa 'dis/ lus dang sems la su rung ste/ 'dun pa dang / brtson
123a1(mdo sde): 'grus dang / sems dang dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// bag yod pa'i
123a2(mdo sde): spyod pa des kyang don dang nges pa tshig thams cad sdud pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rab tu thog// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'byer pa spangs te/ bcom
123a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyi su gyur tam/ de'i tshe
123a4(mdo sde): tsom zan khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i// phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to// 
123a5(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho de'i dus na gang dag dge slong rab tu byung ba de'i rjesu rab tu byung ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng mang por gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin snyam du
123a6(mdo sde): khyed sems na de de ltar mo lta ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir gang dag khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ 
123a7(mdo sde): srog chags khri brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thab par gyur to// 
123a8(mdo sde): sngon byung ba'i le'us 'acu 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bre gros rgya mtshol bag 'phrul pa/ bu gros rgya mtshod ska pas na ldan med pa yang sa
123b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi rjesu bslab par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas tshig
123b2(mdo sde): tu byas shing tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya bar bya'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin zhe na/ 
123b3(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyasu 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig ni brjod par sla'i/ dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgrub pa ni dka'o snyam pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems
123b4(mdo sde): dpa' gang la las chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te/ kho bos sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o zhes byas la/ mang du thos pa dang / de las
123b5(mdo sde): gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnam/ sa la brtson par mi byed na/ de sems can de dag la slu ba yin te/ de skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin// blo gros rgya
123b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad 'gron tu gnyer te/ kho bos sems can khyed chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o// zhes byas
123b7(mdo sde): la mang du thos pa dang / de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpas ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin// zla gros
123b8(mdo sde): rgyam ma 'ongs te// dab na/ rgyal ba las rgyal pa'i byun pa kreng rkye kyi skyeb mas ca sa rkyen napa'i dre tshupas la sal /  rkyen/ 
124a1(mdo sde): des skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bslus pa yin te/ de dag kyang gza' ba dang btung ba'i zas ma thob pas 'phya zhing slar 'dor ba de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub
124a2(mdo sde): sems dpas ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma byin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongasu mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir/ sems can tham
124a3(mdo sde): cad dbugs byung la mang du thos pa dang / de las gzhan pa dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par mi byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' do ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin
124a4(mdo sde): te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba yin// de lta bu de sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi mthong ma/ 'phya zhing // gnogs 'byas byed la rnam par slong / gang dag
124a5(mdo sde): mchod sbyin bya bar dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa 'i mchod sbyin gyi bdag po de dag ni dkono// de bas kyang gang dge mchod sbyin chen po de brtsams nas/ bla na med pa'i thag
124a6(mdo sde): pa chen po la yongasu skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dag ni ches dkono// blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' gang gis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu bar 'gyur ba'i
124a7(mdo sde): tshig brjod par mi bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' gang la chos kyi don bya ba gsol ba btab la/ de la byang chub sems dpas kho bos khyod kyi chos
124a8(mdo sde): kyi don 'di yongasu thob par bya'o zhes tshig smras par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa de la lus ni yongasu gtang bar bya'i/ sems can slu bar ni mi bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis
124b1(mdo sde): kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ seng+ge'i rgyal po dang
124b2(mdo sde): dkar lta bu'i ral pa can yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad la byams pa'i rje su zhugs pa rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu la mos pa zhig ri'i phug bgrod
124b3(mdo sde): dka' ba de na gan so// ri'i phug 'grod dka' ba de na spre'u pho mo gnyis shig kyang gnaso// de nas dus gzhan zhig ma spre'u mo de la bu 'brangs nas/ de las phrug gu gnyis byung // de nas spre'u
124b4(mdo sde): dang / spre'u mo des/ phrug gu de gnyis ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge la gtams te spyad yul du dong // de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri pa zhes bya ba steng gi bar snang las babs te/ spre'u yaM
124b5(mdo sde): drug gu de gnyis blangs nas/ steng gi bar snang la gnas par gyur pa dang / ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ges bya rgod kyi rgyal bo spu gribs spre'u drug gu de gnyis khyer ba mthong // 
124b6(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang tshigasu bcad smras pa// bya rgod rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol pa// bdag gi spre'u phrug de gnyis khyod kyis mtho ngo // bdag ni de dag 'jigs med bya phyir gnas// 
124b7(mdo sde): skyabasu dong ba ma bsad khyod kyis mthong // de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal pos/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge de la tshig su bcad de smras pa// ri dgas kyi rgyal po gal te khyod ni bdag 'dor na// 
124b8(mdo sde): ltar na ni 'di gnyis mi gsad gtang bar bya// kho bos 'di gnyis zos nas kho bo mkha' la gnas// khyod ni khros par gyur kyang bdag la ci byar yod// ri dwags kyi rgyal pos yang smras pa/ 
125a1(mdo sde): bdag ni gtang gis yongasu bza' bar gyis// bdag gi sde drug gnyis ni gtang bar gsol// byang chub zhugs pa dam bcas srung bar byed// mkhas pa dag ni brdzun
125a2(mdo sde): du smra ba med// bdag brdzun gyur tu 'ong ste lhag bsam pas// de nas drang srong chen po lus 'dor te// de nas lhag pa'i bsam pas dgar gyur nas// sems can rnams kyi ched du lus btang
125a3(mdo sde): de nas bya rgod rgyal des rmad du byung mthong nas// na mkhar gnas te ched brjod ched du brjod// gang dag gzhan phyir rang gi lus 'dor ba// de dag 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten 'dir bder 'tsho// kho bos
125a4(mdo sde): spre'u drug 'di gnyis gtang bar bya// khyod kyang mtshe zhing ring du chos spyod cig/ blo gros rgya mtsho de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ ri drag sa kyi rgyal po seng+ger gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod
125a5(mdo sde): sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho nga nyid de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ ri dwags kyi rgyal por seng+ger gyur to// 'od srung chen po ni spre'u ru gyur
125a6(mdo sde): tong ra ser skya bzang mo ni spre'u mor gyur to// sgra gcan zin dang kun dga' bo ni sde phrug tu gyur to// dge slong 'phreng ba bzang ba ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gr-i pa zhes bya
125a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus ni yongasu btang bar bya'i/ skyabasu dong ba dag ni yongasu btang bar mi bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de
125a8(mdo sde): bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de la ji skad smras pa/ de bzhin byed pa gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe bdog pa thad yongasu
125b1(mdo sde): gtong bar snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// de ltar na ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yino// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe tshul khrims pa
125b2(mdo sde): bslab pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing spyod par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ 
125b3(mdo sde): gang gi tshe gnod sems dang tha ba dang / zhe sdang spong bar snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe dge ba'i chos thams
125b4(mdo sde): cad yongasu tshol ba la brtson par snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / 
125b5(mdo sde): ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sna nga ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smra ba ni ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe tshig
125b6(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba'i spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas par snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dag spang bar smra ba dang / dge ba'i
125b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba smra ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu
125b8(mdo sde): tshol ba la brtson par snang ba 'di ni de'i de bzhin byed pa'o// gzhan yang bsam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// g.yo med cing sgyu med pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// sbyor ba ni ji skad smra ba'o// sbyor ba nyams
126a1(mdo sde): 'og tu chud par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// rtsom pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// rtsos pa la zhum pa med pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// de la ma chags
126a2(mdo sde): bar khyad par du 'gro ba ni de bzhin byed pa'o// dam bcas pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// thos pa
126a3(mdo sde): sgrub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// tshig gis yang dag par blang ba ni ji skad smra ba'o// lus dang sems zhus pa med pa ni de bzhin du byed pa'o// nga rgyal med pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// ye shes yongasu rdzogs par
126a4(mdo sde): byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// bslab pa yang dag blangs pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// bslab pa ma nyams pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// sems drang po bskyed pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba
126a5(mdo sde): bsgrub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// mi skye ba'i ches la bzod pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni dben/ na byed pa'o// skye ba gcig gis thegs pa ni ji skad smra
126a6(mdo sde): ba'ong byang chub kyi sdong por 'dug pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// yang dag par blangs pa brtan pa ni ji skad smra ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// 
126a7(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni ji skad smra ba'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par byed pa ni de bzhin byed pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga
126a8(mdo sde): lta bu ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
126b1(mdo sde): thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas ma
126b2(mdo sde): skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di thams cad bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsgrub pa 'di yang
126b3(mdo sde): rjes smras pa de bzhin bgyid pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod bsgrub pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal to// chas thams/ 
126b4(mdo sde): ma ldan 'as byas pa larigs kyi bu nyud bsgrub pa las rnams la srabs na gyis shig/ gas leg/ bcom ldan 'das bsgru
126b5(mdo sde): zhes dgyi ba ni gang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid/ kyis mnyam pa nyid du'i tshal nas yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas kyang mngon sum du/ 
126b6(mdo sde): yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa yang dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ri bang rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
126b7(mdo sde): kyang bsgrub pa las brtsams te spobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod slebs par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa ma mchiso// 
126b8(mdo sde): rdo can phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad ma dmigs te/ gang bsgrub pa dang / gang la bsgrub pa'i chos yang dag par rje su mo mthong ba 'dzin
127a1(mdo sde): de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sems kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i rnam par
127a2(mdo sde): shes pa 'jug pa de la sgrub pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de chos gang la yang mi gnas pa lagaso// 
127a3(mdo sde): gang chos gang la yang mi gnas pa de nyid de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lta ba la ma mchis pa ni
127a4(mdo sde): sgrub pa lags te/ lta ba dang bcas pa la sgrub pa ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad gdeg pa ma mchis pa dang gzhag pa ma mchis pas chos
127a5(mdo sde): gang la yang mi lta ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying pos gsol pa/ btso/ ma ldan 'das gnas pa ni g.yo ba lags te/ 
127a6(mdo sde): mi gnas pa g.yo ba ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas par mi bgyid pa de mi g.yo'o// gang me g.yo ba de chos thams cad kyis mi 'khrug ste/ 'di ni
127a7(mdo sde): de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni sems kyis spyod// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni sems
127a8(mdo sde): kyis rgyu go// rje su rgyu go/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems thams cad sems ma mchis par gyur pa de mi sems mi rtog ste/ 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// 
127b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal du gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
127b2(mdo sde): gang tshor ba thams cad kyi rgyun kun nas tshor ba ma mchis shing len pa ma mchis kyang / tshor ba 'gog pa la yang reg par mi bgyid la/ snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyang
127b3(mdo sde): yongasu mi gtong ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen pos kyi bal glang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni phung po lnga
127b4(mdo sde): la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa lags/  byang chub sems dpa' gang phung po lnga yongasu 'tshal ba dang ldan te/ khur myur du 'dor ba de byis pa so so'i skye
127b5(mdo sde): bo phung po lnga la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis gnon pa rnams kyi khur spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang / chos thams cad ma skyes shing mngon par grub pa
127b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pas/ chos gang la yang yang dag pa'i 'du shesu mi 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
127b7(mdo sde): 'das yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgrub pa lags kyis/ yang ba'i sbyor ba'i ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bgyi'o// 
127b8(mdo sde): de la yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe ni/ 'di lta ste/ namakha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems/ 
128a1(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ma skyes pa las kyang skyes/ ma
128a2(mdo sde): byung ba las kyang 'byung yang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la mi gnas pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' dpal brtsegs rgyal pos
128a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mthong la/ snying rje chen po'i go cha yang mi 'dor
128a4(mdo sde): zhing rtsol ba yang don mchis par mthong ba 'di/ ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dang / da' 'od zer thogs pa med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
128a5(mdo sde): rgyu ba'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi laso// ji tsam du bdud kyi las lags pa de tsam du bsgrub pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i gnas la gnas
128a6(mdo sde): pa la ni bdud kyis glags mi rnyed/ bdud kyi las shin tu 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' brtson
128a7(mdo sde): 'grus 'bar gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag chol zhig yongasu 'grub par 'tshal ba de dag gi ni 'bad pa don ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
128a8(mdo sde): yongasu grub pa ma mchis par yang 'dir 'tshal la 'tshal ba gang lags pas kyang rlom sem su mi bgyid pa 'di ni de'i bsgrub pa yang dag pa lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong
128b1(mdo sde): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa de dag la bsgrub pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / rtog
128b2(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa ni sgrub pa te/ gang 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin lagaso// sems kyi rang bzhin lag so// sems kyi rang bzhin
128b3(mdo sde): yongasu 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni sgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
128b4(mdo sde): dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjesu 'jug pa'i rjesu 'jug par bgyi ste/ gang 'dir sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams kyang sems ma lags par sems 'tshal
128b5(mdo sde): ba la 'jug pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag/ so// byang chub sems dpa' ni ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sgrub pa lags te/ ma ni
128b6(mdo sde): ba la ni sgrub pa ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba de rtog pa dang spong bar mi bgyid de/ 
128b7(mdo sde): rtog pa dang spong ba dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
128b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni sgrub pa thob par bgyid pa lags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ma brtan pa ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis
129a1(mdo sde): kyang brtan ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang brtan te/ bsod nams mnyam pa nyid pa ye shes mnyam pa nyid ye shes mnyam nyid pa bsod nams mnyam pa nyid/ bsod
129a2(mdo sde): nams dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid pas/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lagaso// 
129a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dus dpog rgyal pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa ni sgrub pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang
129a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par 'du bar 'tshal nas/ chos gang yang 'byed par yang mi 'gying sbyor bar yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub
129a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' don legs sems kyis gsol pa/ com ldan 'das don la brtan pa lags kyi/ tshig 'a bru la ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub seng
129a6(mdo sde): gang don kyi rje su zhugs pa'i blos/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kunam tu 'dzin pa dang / ston pa bgyid kyang yang dag pa'i don brjod du ma mchis pa de las kyang mi g.yo bo 'di ni de'i
129a7(mdo sde): sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa ni sgrub pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
129a8(mdo sde): gang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa de ni skad dang / tshig dang brjod pa lhur len pa ma lags kyi/ de ni yang dag pa'i sgrub pa tshol lags te/ ji ltar 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang dag par rjesu
129b1(mdo sde): mi mthong ba de ltar tshol ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lag so// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dri med sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos
129b2(mdo sde): dri ma can bkru bar bgyi'o// dri ma mchis pa ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sems yongasu ma dag pa ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs sbyang bar bgyil
129b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gi sems dang yid la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'jug pa de dag pa'o// dag pa gang lags pa de sgrub pa
129b4(mdo sde): yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu
129b5(mdo sde): zin pa ni tshegs chung ngus sgrub pa yang dag pa 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyu ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang la la ngag gnas
129b6(mdo sde): shing bdud kyi lcags kyu las mi 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni sdig pa'i grogs pas yongasu zin pa lag so// gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i
129b7(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' bar 'tshal bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par
129b8(mdo sde): bgyi sten par bgyi/ bsnyen bkur bgyid/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chags chung ngus sgrub pa yang dag pa 'phags pa thob par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsa
130a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams shes sam/ 
130a2(mdo sde): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho gang thos pas/ byang chub sems dpa
130a3(mdo sde): rnams shin tu 'dar bar 'gyur zhing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba choms te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar khyod
130a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags kyu bstan pa la rtsom ste/ spobs par gyis shig/ blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis bdud kyi lcags
130a5(mdo sde): klu bshad par bgyi'o// bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi lcags kyu ni bcu gnyis po 'di da/ de ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ bcom
130a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong son mi phangs pa'i dngos po yong su gtang ba'i sems 'jug/ phangs pa'i dngos po yongasu btang
130a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems mi 'jug pa dang / sems can gang dag de la dga' bar gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par 'byed/ sems can gang dag dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag la ni sbyi
130a8(mdo sde): bgyid cing de ma pa la dadu byed/ sems pa du byedad/ bcom ldan di byang tshungasams dang phyin pa da ldan pa'i dung chags su me ma ma na
130b1(mdo sde): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos can du gyur te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs
130b2(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba phra rags la yang 'jigs par lta/ 'tshe ba yongasu dag/ bslab pa'i gnas yang dag par blangs pa rnams la slob ste/ de tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze
130b3(mdo sde): la spen cing sten la bsnyen bkur bgyid/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams la khro ba dang sdang ba dang / zhe 'gras par bgyid cing / tshul khrims de nyid kyis bdag la bstod/ 
130b4(mdo sde): gzhan la smod na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sem sa dpa'i tshul khrims dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
130b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub ste de lus kyi kyang bzod/ ngag gis kyang bzod na sems kyis gnod pa 'gyid/ de sems can skabs dang ldan pa rnams la ni 'azod/ sems cad
130b6(mdo sde): zhams chung ba rnams la ni mi bzod/ sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la ni bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni gnod sems kyi stobs nye bar ston te/ der
130b7(mdo sde): shig ni bzod/ re shig ni mi bzod/ kha cig la ni bzod/ kha cig la ni mi bzod la/ de gang gi tshe bzod pa de'i tshe bzod pas rgyags te/ rlom semasu bgyid/ gang gi tshe mi bzod pa
130b8(mdo sde): de'i tshe ni myur dus sor mi chags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang du
131a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur la/ de brtson 'grus brtsam par gnas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems can rnams
131a2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bgyid kyi/ theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yengasu smin par mi bgyid/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam rgyun tu ston gyi/ theg pa chen po'i gtam
131a3(mdo sde): 'chal bar bgyid/ 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la zhal ta bgyid par brtsom gyi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongasu mi tshol/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dga'
131a4(mdo sde): ba thob ste/ 'di ltar me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang kha dan rnams kyis de bzhin
131a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bgyidade/ de la gzhol de la 'bab de la bab par gyur kyang thos pa yongasu btsal ba dang / thos pa bstan pa dang / thos pa la so sor
131a6(mdo sde): brtag pa dang / thos pa sgrub par brtson 'grus mi rtsom na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bzhi pa'o// bcom ldan
131a7(mdo sde): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi skyed gzugs ma mchis pa'i snams par 'jug pa bzhi skyed cing sgrub ste/ de dag la rgyun tu mang du gnas par gyur la/ de 'i
131a8(mdo sde): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gnas shing / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba la smod/ chos bstan pa la smad/ sems can dang 'dre ba la smod/ bsod nams kyi 'du
131b1(mdo sde): byed rnams la smod cing mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed kyi ro myang bar bgyid/ gcig pur dga' bas dga' ba thob ste/ 'bad pa chung ngur gnas par gyur nas/ bsam gtan las ldog
131b2(mdo sde): par yongasu mi tshol gyi/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams la gsad par 'du shes shing / gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams kyi ro myang bar bgyid la/ de lus dman
131b3(mdo sde): bas gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams rnamasu skyed par bgyid cing / lha tshe ring po rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye ste/ de der skyes nas kyang gang sangs rgyas mang po dang / sangs
131b4(mdo sde): rgyas stong phrag mang po mnyes par mi bgyid pa de'i ga nas mchi so// sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mnyan po dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang bral bar
131b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshe gas sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ de'i dbang po rnams
131b6(mdo sde): blun zhing rtul ba'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ de nas shi 'phos nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang rtul ba'i rgyud can du 'gyur zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid che bar 'gyur ba 'ang
131b7(mdo sde): ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan du rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste lnga pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
131b8(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur te/ rkyen shin tu mthong ba'i slad du rgyu ba yongasasu shes pa dang ldan par gyur/ rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis par gyur
132a1(mdo sde): te/ bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod/ thabs dang bral/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par mi bgyid/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
132a2(mdo sde): 'grus dang / bsam gratan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson par mi bgyid la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mchog/ shes rab kyi pha rol
132a3(mdo sde): tu phyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni dman pa'o snyam na/ de'i dbang po yongasu ma smin pa btang snom su ltung ba ste/ bsdu
132a4(mdo sde): dngos po bzhis sems can rnams mi bsdud cing / spros pa ma mchis pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa de nyid kyi ro myang bar bgyid pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan
132a5(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang rab tu lnga na ba'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste drug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/ 
132a6(mdo sde): dgon pa par gyur te/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chub la chog shes te/ rab tu dben khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dra la/ de don nyung
132a7(mdo sde): ba dang bgyi ba nyung bas/ bde bar gnas te g.yo ba gca le dz+wa ra ma mchis kyang mang du thos pa yongasu btsal ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa la brtson par mi
132a8(mdo sde): gnas chos kyi 'brel ba'i dka' mching dang don rnam par nges pa'i bka' mching bgyi ba la rgyun dgum par sems te/ yongasu 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/ dge ba ci zhes tshol ba
132b1(mdo sde): la mi brtson pade dgon pa la gnas pa dang / gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi rgyu ste/ de kun nas ldang ba gnod pa tsam gyis dga' ba theb cing bag la nyal yang
132b2(mdo sde): dag par gzhom pa'i slang du las sgom par mi bgyi de den bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don gyi slad du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dben pa la
132b3(mdo sde): gnas pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bdun pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos par gyur te/ chos kyi gtam can ni tshig mnyan par 'ongs pa
132b4(mdo sde): tshig gzung bar 'os pa/ snyan par sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang / de zang zing gi slang du ches sten te/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma
132b5(mdo sde): lags/ gang las de'i gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gses sman dang / yo byad rnams mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag la chos ston gyi/ sems can gang dag dad pa dang
132b6(mdo sde): ldan zhing dang ba mang ba legs par bshad pa'i don 'tshal bar nus shing stobs dang ldan pa zang zing gis de rjesu 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos mi ston pa dang / gang dag de la bged par
132b7(mdo sde): bgyid pa ni dman pa la dman par gyur pa/ gti mugi rang bzhin can/ chos rgya chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang / de zang zing gis spags pa'i rgyu des/ gang dag
132b8(mdo sde): chos bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ snod du ma gyur pa de dag la ches ston pa dang / gang dag bstan par bgyi ba de dag la mi snyan pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan
133a1(mdo sde): pa dang rab tu mi ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rgyang pan pa yongasu tshol te/ de
133a2(mdo sde): de gzhan dag la zab mo'i bka' mchid kyi rgyun bkum nas/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i bka' mching sna tshogs ston to// 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i bka' mching ston pas/ 'jig rten
133a3(mdo sde): dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i tshig dang / lam gyi tshig la mkhas pas sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/ de la leg so legs zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar 'gyur la/ 
133a4(mdo sde): des kyang byang chub sems dpa' yi rangs par 'gyur ba drang / lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos zab mo la mes pa/ ches mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur pa dag
133a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yi ma rangs na/ sa gang 'jig rten gyi dga' bas mngon par dga' ba'i sa// mas can de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad/ 'jig
133a6(mdo sde): rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/ dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ma yino// de'i'i phyir zhe na/ don zab mo'i phyir
133a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams 'byung gi/ 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin zhes mchi zhing 'khor de nas mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra'o// bcom ldan
133a8(mdo sde): 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs bgyid kyi/ zab mo'i bka' mchid 'chab pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad
133b1(mdo sde): zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dka' mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu sde dgu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
133b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa/ sdig pa'i thogs gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las 'dun pa klog pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi/
