133b3(mdo sde): pa las 'dun pa theg pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba las 'dun pa rlog pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang / don nyung zhing bgyid
133b4(mdo sde): panyung ba la sbyor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun tu mang du ston pa dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchingad de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen
133b5(mdo sde): cing bsten to bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / gang gi// tshe byang chub sems dpa' da nan la theg pa chen po las ldang ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za bar zhal
133b6(mdo sde): byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgying ba'i dri ma la sbyor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta 'gying ba'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshe/ dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma
133b7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston/ byang chub sems dpa' las yang dag pa/ yang dag phul gang lags pa de dag de la mi ston to// byang chub
133b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul de dag gang lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag phul lagaso// bcu po de dag gang zhe
134a1(mdo sde): gan 'di lta ste/ dang pa'i rtsa ba la rab tu gnas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar
134a2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongasu tshol ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i brtson pa 'dor ba dang / bag mchis par las bgyis pa chud mi gzon pa dang / 
134a3(mdo sde): bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos songasu 'dzin pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / 
134a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyangs pa'i slad du bsod nam sa kyi tshogs yongasu tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / gzung sa dang slebs pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes
134a5(mdo sde): kyi tshogs tshol ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
134a6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi sa las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du/ thabs la mkhas pa yongasu tshol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag
134a7(mdo sde): phul lags te/ gang dag la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de dag de la mi ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du byang chub ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i yin gyi/ 
134a8(mdo sde): le lo can gyi ma yi no// gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma rgyas na/ phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag
134b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nuso// zhes mchil/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid ba'i
134b2(mdo sde): gnas mchis no/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
134b3(mdo sde): dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ deng rgyal ngos bla ma rnams dang / sbyin gnas rnams dang / pa ma dang slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / de las
134b4(mdo sde): gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing / de la rdza gus par gyur pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
134b5(mdo sde): rnams la mkhas pa khyad par thob pa/ gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i/ bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan tu mi mchi/ mi
134b6(mdo sde): bsnyen mi sten/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/ yongasu mi 'dri/ yongasu 'dri bar mi stsol cing / de ma thos pa'i chos nyan par mi bgyid/ thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongasu dkar bar mi bgyid/ 
134b7(mdo sde): de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa/ chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa/ de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rje su 'jug
134b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / de dman pa la sten cing khyad par dang bral ba 'di lta ste zhan pa'i 'gro ba/ blun pa/ 'on pa/ lkug pa'i 'gro ba/ 'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di
135a1(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogasu shing tsam pa ka bskum la/ chab sol bar mi bgyid kyi/ gang nas chab mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs/ 
135a2(mdo sde): de yang gor ma dang / gyo mog dag gis bkum nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar na zhugs shing tsam pa ka chab dang bral ba yal ka dang / lo ma dang / yal ga bre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags
135a3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang skam ste/ ngogs la ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems
135a4(mdo sde): bskyed la/ nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur na/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos mnyan pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mi nyan thos pa'i chos rnams kyang
135a5(mdo sde): yongasu dkar bar mi bgyid// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchi bar gyur/ pa de'i tshe/ gzhol ba'i phyogs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de gzhol
135a6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ chu klung thams cad dang / chab mig dang / 'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang / 
135a7(mdo sde): sbyin gnas la gus pa yang tshegs chu dus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro// de dran pa la yang gnas par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na
135a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyi khengs/ nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ bla ma dang sbyin gnas la kun tu mi 'dud cing / 'dud par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
135b1(mdo sde): ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ 
135b2(mdo sde): bcu gcig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang / longs spyod che zhing nor mang la/ mdzod dang bang ba
135b3(mdo sde): mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / rus dang / rigs dang / g.yog 'khor dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes
135b4(mdo sde): kyi tshogs yongasu btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs kyis rgyags shing bag ma mchis par
135b5(mdo sde): gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ ye shes kyi tshegs yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa/ gdags dang
135b6(mdo sde): gser mas sha dang khrag skams pa/ skyes pa nyam chung ba/ lus rtsas yog pa/ mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i chos
135b7(mdo sde): yongasu btsal ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la snyems zhing nyam chung la/ mdog ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o snyam du sems shing de dag nyam chung la/ mdog
135b8(mdo sde): ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o snyam du sems shing de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan mi 'tshal gyi/ de de bas shas cher dben zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ 
136a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang / bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
136a2(mdo sde): bcu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu ma 'das na/ tha na rje su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi 'thog
136a3(mdo sde): na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
136a4(mdo sde): dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'dar bar bgyi'o// 
136a5(mdo sde): bam po bcu ba ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis byang chub
136a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag legs par bshad pa le gso legaso// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub
136a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad// blo gros rgya mtsho
136a8(mdo sde): bdud kyi lcags kyu rag tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos sgo yin// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ blo
136b1(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di
136b2(mdo sde): ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongasu
136b3(mdo sde): thar par byed pas/ sems can thams cad 'ar snying rje ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang / 
136b4(mdo sde): bzhin pas/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / sem ngas can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam sa bzhin du skye ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu
136b5(mdo sde): gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhi na pas/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs
136b6(mdo sde): kyang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongasu smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni zhe sdang bral
136b7(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin pas/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can yongasu smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo
136b8(mdo sde): lnga pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongasu smin
137a1(mdo sde): par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ kun
137a2(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can yongasu smin par byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o// 
137a3(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba
137a4(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni dang mnyam zhing bye brag
137a5(mdo sde): med pa'i rang bzhin pas dang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang / theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yod/ su mi 'dor bar sems can la theg pa gsum rnam
137a6(mdo sde): par dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang / rnam par
137a7(mdo sde): shes pa la yang gnas la/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/ brtson pa thams cad dang yang brel la/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba'i rtsom pa yang mi 'dor/ spyod pa thams
137a8(mdo sde): cad las kyang shin tu 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lcags kyu
137b1(mdo sde): / rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rab tu sbyor na/ bdud kyi
137b2(mdo sde): lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyuraro// bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog meg por gyur
137b3(mdo sde): te rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu byung bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog par
137b4(mdo sde): gyur pa de bzhin du nga'i tshe/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis lta sa rgya chen po 'di mthong nas rings shing myur bar la gor du
137b5(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/ bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod pa 'dra bas dpag tshad sum ca
137b6(mdo sde): rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus der de sgrims par gyur te/ 'ongs
137b7(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dadul bar gyur pa rnams dang / gang dag srid pa
137b8(mdo sde): kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtog par gang gis kyang de ma mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zla
138a1(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal ba/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// 
138a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho bdang sdig can 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs na ni ci zhig bya/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
138a3(mdo sde): deng 'dir bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces
138a4(mdo sde): smraso// rigs kyi bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ga la yod/ de na smon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bya// blo gros rgya mtshos
138a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams
138a6(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya ba chos ston to// ci'i
138a7(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu
138a8(mdo sde): dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
138b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe/ de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las
138b2(mdo sde): bdud kun tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas/ 'od zer nges bskul bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khong pa/ bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag
138b3(mdo sde): bcu yod pa de dge thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus
138b4(mdo sde): te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'ang sa de'i zhabs gnyis la gtug so// des kyang ji ltar de ngag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
138b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de phyis byang chub theb ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab
138b6(mdo sde): tu 'jom pa zhes bya'o// de byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i blugs kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam so// rim gro pa yang bdud las btul
138b7(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa da ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' shig yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de na theg pa
138b8(mdo sde): gzhan gyi mang yang med/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/ der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi las byed par mi 'gyur gyi// bdud
139a1(mdo sde): las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chechos rnams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
139a2(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can sngangs skrag 'jigs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na/ 'gro ma nus te/ mi snang bar ma gyur na/ de de bas kyang cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ 
139a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das
139a4(mdo sde): bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa ba ngag la bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba dka' stsal pa/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ skyes bu
139a5(mdo sde): dam pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ sems can la rnam par ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yino// sdig can khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig dang / 
139a6(mdo sde): 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smraso// skyes bu dam pa khyod
139a7(mdo sde): bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phang bar gsol/ ji ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khong lta bu chos ston par 'gyur/ 
139a8(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor der bar chang bgyi ba'i slad du/ lan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ sdig can kho bo lta bu dag la bzod pa gsol mi
139b1(mdo sde): dgoso// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid// sdig can khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/ 
139b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la ltos shig dang / khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub seng
139b3(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtshos lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdud sdig can gyi spyi bor gzhag nas/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi
139b4(mdo sde): ser sna dang / slob dpon chos kyi dpe ma khyud med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta
139b5(mdo sde): bu'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byaso// byang chub sem sa dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan
139b6(mdo sde): par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ sangs rgyas zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te// 'di ltar byang chub sems
139b7(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig cen
139b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
140a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de'i sangs
140a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu
140a3(mdo sde): 'jom pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
140a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nung phyogs leg su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ gang+gA'i krung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
140a5(mdo sde): mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhug so// 'tshe'o// gzheso// 
140a6(mdo sde): 'das pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to// yang dag par rab tu 'chang // der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing bgrang ba las shin tu
140a7(mdo sde): 'das pa dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba go cha
140a8(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la yongasu 'dri zhing yongasu 'drir 'jug pa yang 'dus par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe bdud
140b1(mdo sde): sdig can mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu dam pa des 'as pa'i dbang nye bar gzung ste/ bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'bang so// 
140b2(mdo sde): nas bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras// kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/ sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
140b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/ kho bo cag
140b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
140b5(mdo sde): cig de nas bdud sdig can gyi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis/ bla na med pa
140b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes smras// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i
140b7(mdo sde): khri la bzhag ste/ de nas 'das pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba bta'o// de nas byang chub
140b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gang dud sdig can seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i sgo dang / ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'dus
141a1(mdo sde): chen po'o le'u rab tu bshad pa lta bu'i gtam byung ste/ yi ge de dag dang tshig dang / yi ge 'i bu de dag dang mnyam nying mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis
141a2(mdo sde): rlabs byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam thos nas ngo mtshar du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
141a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho de dang / phyogs
141a4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pas mdzod spu nas/ gzugs
141a5(mdo sde): thams cad smon pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer/ byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma steng dag las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
141a6(mdo sde): mjed 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rin po che bkod pa 'khor gyi khyams na bskal pa
141a7(mdo sde): brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin pa'i sang+ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ 'das pa chen po
141a8(mdo sde): le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho yang mthong // 'jig rten gyis mi mjed chus yongasu gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur
141b1(mdo sde): gnas par 'di yang mthong // ngan sgrib pa ci yang med par mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad+ma dag la
141b2(mdo sde): 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
141b3(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su me tog gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtsham su me tog gdugs chen por
141b4(mdo sde): gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ me tog gdugs de mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dasra la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
141b5(mdo sde): gang me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i me tog 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ pa/ grogs po dag me tog 'di dag ni bde ba thams
141b6(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nga la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bde ba
141b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de dang / bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na ci bgyid
141b8(mdo sde): pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor nges gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bde
142a1(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'dzem pa de dang / bdud sdig can de 'khor 'di la ston cig/ 
142a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od zer steng brag bcu phyung nas/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu
142a3(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag las 'das nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / bde ba
142a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'dzom pa de dang / bdud sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la 'dug ste/ 
142a5(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa yang mthong // mthong nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa 'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i
142a6(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag gis mu tig dang me tog gis gtor to// gtor ma thag tu
142a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtsham su me togi khang pa brtsegs pa chen por gnas par kun tu snang // de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan
142a8(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'jom pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan du mchis
142b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de 'i la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
142b2(mdo sde): lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de
142b3(mdo sde): las mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
142b4(mdo sde): te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAdi'i bus/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// grogs
142b5(mdo sde): bo khyod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyi brgyan pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA rA ti bu bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yong su dag pa de
142b6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ ji ltar dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas de ngo mtshar to// bdag gis mthong nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
142b7(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed do// smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na khyod ci yang bdud kyi las lha byed dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa
142b8(mdo sde): shA radwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang gis kyang bdud kyi las mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag pa
143a1(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud kyi las byed pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus
143a2(mdo sde): rtsomo/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed pa de nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la su brjod kyi/ bdud kyi
143a3(mdo sde): las ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par
143a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mgrin gcig tu bcom
143a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams/ cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig ces tshig de skad smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs
143a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kum tu bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
143a7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad mang ba/ phyi rgol ba mang ba lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde
143a8(mdo sde): 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa de dag la yang bdud dam bdud kyis res/ 
143b1(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / yongasu gzung ba'i
143b2(mdo sde): slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho
143b3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
143b4(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// blo gro/ sa rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
143b5(mdo sde): shig dang / tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhid ga bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongasu gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed
143b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa me sa ma san d+hi/ sa ra ne/ sarab ti
143b7(mdo sde): d+ha ne/ d+ha na/ ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ d+hud+hu ma ti/ A ba te/ a ma le/ bi ma lau/ bi ra dze/ ka ka re/ kA ru Ne/ hu hu/ hu hu ba ti/ hu hu san d+hi ni rag+hA ta ni/ a ba Te/ bI bang Te/ ma d+hu ma ti/ mar
143b8(mdo sde): dzi te/ bi shud+d+he/ bi shud+d+ha ba ti/ mi si le/ ma nor nyer/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni// dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas/ chos kyi
144a1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongasu bzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur// sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba nges legs pa gabatsa
144a2(mdo sde): tu byas te/ phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bsam na/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas 'ong bar 'gyu ro// de
144a3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
144a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par gang na yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang
144a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba der/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongasu gzung ba dang // ci nas gang gis kyang ma sgrib pa 'am/ gnod pa bgyid
144a6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig brjod par bya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya/ 
144a7(mdo sde): byin dgug par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dza yaM/ dza ya ma ti/ ad te/ mang Te/ mang ku re/ sid+d+ha ma ti/ shu b+he/ 
144a8(mdo sde): ldan ti ka re/ nad ne/ ngan te/ dran tam ti/ tad ka ra/ k+Sha ye/ k+Sha ya mu khe/ ma dpang dran/ bi ngad rnga ni/ pa'i ba Ta ni/ ba tshi skr-i ti/ s+thi ti san d+hi/ mA gats+tsha ka ru sha~M ka/ ni rdzi tA/ ma ruH
144b1(mdo sde): dza yan ti de ga/ sa ma ya ste/ a rab d+ho/ d+harma ni dzi to/ ra ma hi/ swa smye ya nam/ b+hu tA nAm/ a rak+Sha d+harma tsar nam// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po/ 
144b2(mdo sde): brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyuraro// der chos smra ba des sngags kyi tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang / 
144b3(mdo sde): gtsang sbra'i tsho gas khrus legs par byas te/ gos bzang po bgos la shar phyogasu me tog gtor te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams pa'i dran pa dang / sems can thams
144b4(mdo sde): cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas/ sad+mo'i khri la 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsams la/ koTashi ka 'khor legs par yong su gzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog/ 
144b5(mdo sde): sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyis/ de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongasu dag la tshul khrims yongasu dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya
144b6(mdo sde): byin 'ongs nas/ 'khor yong su 'jog par 'gyur/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug ba des
144b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu bzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slang du bdag chos smra de'i drung
144b8(mdo sde): du mchi bar bgyi/ ngo'i 'khor yongasu gzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum
145a1(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
145a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slang du'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
145a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
145a4(mdo sde): leg so// zhes bya ba byin te/ ko lu shi ka khyod kyis dam pa'i tshe sa yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ seng+ge'i sgra sgrags pa legaso leg so// de lta bu ni khyod kyis bya ba'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyi
145a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsams na/ lha rnams ni rgyal zhi lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya/ 'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi
145a6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste/ sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur// sngags kyi
145a7(mdo sde): tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha me/ sha ma ba ti/ sha mi ta sha tru/ ang ku re/ mang ku re/ mA ra dzi taM/ kuM na She yu/ ke yu re/ te dze ba ti/ o lo ya ni/ bi sha tra ni rma le/ ma la
145a8(mdo sde): ba na ye/ khu khu re/ kha ge gra se/ gra sa ne/ oM mu khi/ ba rA mu khI/ A mu khI/ sha mi ti ni/ sarba gra ha ban d+hA na nI/ gr-i hi tA/ sarba mA ra pra bA rdi ni/ bi mug tI mA ra pA shA sI bi ta bud+d+ha mu dra/ 
145b1(mdo sde): a nud ga ti ta sarba mA raM/ pu tsa ri ta/ pa dang ri shud+d+ha/ bi gats+tshan tu sarba mA ra karma Ni// blo gros rgya mtsho tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar gtsang ba'i tshig/ nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/ de
145b2(mdo sde): dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton tu byas la/ chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/ byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas/ 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/ bdag la
145b3(mdo sde): sman par 'du shes bskyed/ chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos nyan pa la nang pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul
145b4(mdo sde): la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos kyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag brgya tshun chad du bdud dang bdud kyi ris
145b5(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'o/ nga bar mi 'gyuraro// gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang bar chad byed par mi nuso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud
145b6(mdo sde): sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa skyes
145b7(mdo sde): bu ngam pa de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang che 'phrul 'di dag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan chang bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor// gang mchos kyi rnam
145b8(mdo sde): grangs 'di ston pa dang / yang dag par rab tu snyan par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der chos mnyam pa'i slad du bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa
146a1(mdo sde): dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas pas mchi bar dgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can leg so lag so// khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par
146a2(mdo sde): smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thob pa'i chos de dag rje su thob par 'gyur// blo gros rgya mcho ga zhan yang ma
146a3(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya ste/ dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig de dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// sngags
146a4(mdo sde): kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ me tre ka re/ kA ru NA ka re/ mug te ta kA re/ u be ga k+Sha kaR+She/ d+haHka re/ sang gA ka re/ su kr-i ta bi dza ye/ ma hA bi tAn/ 
146a5(mdo sde): ni s+pha re/ dA g+he o dze ba ti/ o dze ga me d+harma na nga ne/ sa t+ya pri ti sh+ma ne/ u pa bad ti/ bi shud+d+he/ swa tsing to ba sha me/ bya ba lo ka ya pra mA na/ byung tiSh+Ta/ sa mi d+hi/ a be k+Sha sA d+harma
146a6(mdo sde): rtsa rA NA na/ ku ru sad d+harma pa ri/ gra ha na/ kri ta ma nu pA la ya/ bud+d+ha ne/ tri ma me bya ba tshe/ ba sI/ smA ra ta/ d+harma tsakra pra bar+t+ta nAn/ ku ru sa tA bi sho d+ha nAn/ pra ti gri hAn d+harma nAm/ 
146a7(mdo sde): ga ra mA la tan/ bud d+ha a b+hiny+dza na ma mA bi ko pa ya// blo gros rgya mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgrags pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la/ tshangs pa'i lam/ 
146a8(mdo sde): la shin tu gnas te/ zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dbang po shin tu sbas ba dang / shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang / shin tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongasu
146b1(mdo sde): dag pa'i lus kyi las dang / shin tu bden pas zin pa'i ngag gis las dang / shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang / legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang / shin tu yongasu sbyangs pa'i tshul
146b2(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po dang / legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shin tu sten pa'i mang du thos pa dang / shin tu yongasu bsgoms pa'i sems la su rung ba dang / shin tu
146b3(mdo sde): rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang / shin tu yongasu bsgom pa'i byams pa dang / 
146b4(mdo sde): shin tu brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las shin tu yongasu dgrel ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i
146b5(mdo sde): khri la 'dug ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsam sa la/ chos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu brjod na/ nges bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa tshangs ris
146b6(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor thams
146b7(mdo sde): cad byams pa'i semasu 'gyur ba dang / dbang po nyams pa med pa dang / gcig la gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang / chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang / bla ma ltar phangs
146b8(mdo sde): par sems pa dang / thal me sbyor ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang / mi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing ltar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems thams cad kyis sems
147a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rna ba blags te nyan par 'gyur ba'o// chos smra ba de la yang sngon lung me mnos pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur te/ 'khor
147a2(mdo sde): der mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs par rig par bya'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
147a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor
147a4(mdo sde): der mchi bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bslab par bgyi'o// brgyad gang ne na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ra mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/ 
147a5(mdo sde): chos zab mo rtog par bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gro/ sa bsgrub par bgyi'o// don gyi rnam pa rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la rtogs pa sgrub par bgyi/ 'khor tham
147a6(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mi non par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la 'dul bar bsrungs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ mi dman par lung bstan par bya ba'i slad du/ de la chos kyi snang ba sgrub par bgyi/ 
147a7(mdo sde): de bgyid cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du/ de la nges par 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po 'di dag bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba de
147a8(mdo sde): la bsrung zhing sba ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs
147b1(mdo sde): 'di rgyas par 'gyur ba ltar bdud thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gtsang bar bgyi'o// de na bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya
147b2(mdo sde): mchos 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug par mchi ba
147b3(mdo sde): dang / khong du chud ba dang / glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyi rlabs du gsol/ de nas bcom
147b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsel ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
147b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas 'di na/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal
147b6(mdo sde): dang rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gzugasu snang ba gang dag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugasu snang // rin po che bkod pa'i gzugasu snang // rin po che bkod
147b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlab pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par kun tu snang // de
147b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlab so// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin
148a1(mdo sde): kyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyis
148a2(mdo sde): brlabs pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar chad bya bar mi nuso// bcom ldan 'das gal te gang+gA'i klung bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs/ 
148a3(mdo sde): 'di la bar chad bya bar brtun kyang / de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar mo nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa ni 'gas kyang srid/ rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang
148a4(mdo sde): sring ri rab thams cad ni rnam par 'thor mang srid/ rlung ni nags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ nyim dang zla ba ni sa'i steng du lhung yang srong / nam pa ni gzugs kyi rnam par
148a5(mdo sde): bstan tu rung yang srid/ me ni chur 'gyur yang srid/ chu/ ni mer 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi
148a6(mdo sde): sems ni gcig tu byar rung yang srid/ na mkha' dang seMn 'byar kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni sus kyang bskyed pa 'am/ g.yo ba 'am 'khrugs par byed mi
148a7(mdo sde): nuso zhes gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod/ 
148a8(mdo sde): kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
148b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs
148b2(mdo sde): na de lta ma lags pa/ rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po ltar gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/ dge slong kun
148b3(mdo sde): dga' bo nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa la/ chos kyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongasu gtad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho dge slong kun dka' bo rang gi blo'i stobs
148b4(mdo sde): bskyed pas/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/ de zhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi 'dzin to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos
148b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod/ de dag 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
148b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyuraro// de nas
148b7(mdo sde): 'khor de nas lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog
148b8(mdo sde): tu bstan pa'i tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni de lha ma yin snyam// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor gyi sem
149a1(mdo sde): can rnams la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang / 
149a2(mdo sde): ldan pa lags kyi gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
149a3(mdo sde): 'od srung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sems can ji tsam du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yino zhes
149a4(mdo sde): gang de skad du bya ba de la ji snyam du sems/ 'od srung sems can gyi khams de mang ngam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma
149a5(mdo sde): mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / 'od srung yongasu brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par
149a6(mdo sde): gyur la/ de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' ngo ltar dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang / kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i sems can de dag gi dran pa dang gzungs
149a7(mdo sde): kyi stobs de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'drin pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod// 'od
149a8(mdo sde): srung byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos
149b1(mdo sde): bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi bye'o// 'od srung 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po shing rta'i srog shing
149b2(mdo sde): tsam gyi char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu'i rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba ni byed/ chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas/ de la
149b3(mdo sde): 'grib pa 'am gang ba yang mdo// 'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang / de bzhin gshegs
149b4(mdo sde): ba gcig gis chos bstan pas/ de bzhin gshe gas pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun na sa ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed/ de'i dran pa'i stobs skyed pa la bri ba
149b5(mdo sde): 'am gang ba yang medo// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// srog chags brgyad steng gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ tshig 'di skad ces
149b6(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smraso// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha dang / mi'i me tog gis
149b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la gtor/ mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ce gsol to// bcom
149b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos nas mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin
150a1(mdo sde): nyid du nan tan bgyis pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigasu bcad bka'
150a2(mdo sde): sul pa/ stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni/ gsor gyis bkang ste bde gshegs phul ba bas// gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad
150a3(mdo sde): par 'phags// gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa// bsod nams de la snga mas bskyed
150a4(mdo sde): du med// gang gis 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag bcu// / rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas// gang gis mad 'di bton nas ston pa yi// bsod nams de yi char ni snga ma
150a5(mdo sde): min nga zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams// rin no na bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon skyog/ sangs rgyas rnam sa la dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu
150a6(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / phyogs bcu rnam su gang+ga'i byed snyed zhing // rin chen bkang ste rgyal ba phul ba bas// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i// bsod nams de la mnyam pa yang ma yin// 
150a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang // chos sgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba// chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te// de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsu
150a8(mdo sde): na mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems// chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste// mkhas pa rnams kyi de thos dogs mi bya// 
150b1(mdo sde): dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur// snang ba byung zhing me tog char kyang bab// sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang 'byung // byang chub
150b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mkhas pa de dag kun// mgun ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams// 'tshe ba don yong rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag
150b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed//  byang chub sems ni mi brjed pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs
150b4(mdo sde): rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu ba rkyang mdzad// yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni// shAkya seng+ge'i bskul ba legs shes gsung // lha dang klu dang lha min
150b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci// dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye 'tshe// / brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// namakha ra gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod// shAkya seng+ge 'di dang
150b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang // mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur// legs gsungs chos ni gzhan yang nub ma gyur// gang dag ches kyi tshul
150b7(mdo sde): ni 'di 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi// bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni// kun tu srung zhing sba ba spro bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
150b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa// blo gros rgya mtsho tshe spyi tshul chos kyi phyag rgya chos btus pa// chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma
151a1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bshad pa/ 'chad pa 'chang bar 'gyur ba te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang
151a2(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / zhes dang bcas pa dang / sgrub pa snying por bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / 
151a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
151a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// byin gyi rlabs kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags
151a5(mdo sde): pablo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa// rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan be dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / bud d+ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo
151a6(mdo sde): tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sA gar nA ga rA dza ba ri brid tsha/ nA ma ma hA yA na
151a7(mdo sde): sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
151a8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad stong gis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
151b1(mdo sde): po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad
151b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde rtogs par khong du chud pa/ sems can thams cad spobs pas mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu
151b3(mdo sde): phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang / snyems par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod
151b4(mdo sde): cing bsngags pa la snyan par brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa mkhas pa/ 
151b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs
151b6(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par bsgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos
151b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis ma gos pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med
151b8(mdo sde): par brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongasu mi skyo ba/ seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/ pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa/ 
152a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun pa dang / ri rab dang / 
152a2(mdo sde): lhun po chen po dang / lhun po chen po rtse 'dzin dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i mtshan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i
152a3(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen tog dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / rin chen dpal dang / rin chen 'byung dang / rin chen 'od
152a4(mdo sde): dang rin chen khar ba can dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rin chen dra ba dang / rin chen bkod pa dang dzin dag pa na gli dang / rin chen sgron ma dang / lag na rin chen dang / 
152a5(mdo sde): dga' byed dang / chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis yang dag par ba rgyan pa dang / tshig bkod pa'i 'od dang / tshig rnam par
152a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i 'od dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / lha brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / 'od zer stong ldan dang / me lce dang / skar ma la dga' ba dang / zla 'od dang / sem
152a7(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gser bzangs rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'jigs pa
152a8(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / 
152b1(mdo sde): bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum
152b2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rab 'thab 'bral la sogs pa thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po yongasu dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams
152b3(mdo sde): dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po yang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu deng
152b4(mdo sde): dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang / rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams dang / mi mjed kyi
152b5(mdo sde): bdag po la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams/ lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la sogs pa/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po dge rgyas
152b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas
152b7(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dri med 'od la sogs pa/ 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi
152b8(mdo sde): dbang po drug khri dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa/ mi 'am ci bzhi khri nyis stong dang / dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs pa la sogs pa dri za sum khri nyis steng dang / klu'i
153a1(mdo sde): rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang / bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding bzhi stong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
153a2(mdo sde): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
153a3(mdo sde): 'khor stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing / lha thams cad kyis bkod pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsham
153a4(mdo sde): nang nas gyen tu 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi yongasu bskor te/ lha me/ 
153a5(mdo sde): lha ne/ lhang zhing bzhug so// de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'kho/ nyer gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs
153a6(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis logs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i
153a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di kum tu khebs par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan 'phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po
153a8(mdo sde): dang mu tig dri ma med pa dang / gser lta bu'i mu tig dang / zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang / pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang / namakha' lta bu'i mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang// mu tigi rgyan
153b1(mdo sde): 'phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung // 'od zer de dag las kyang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag gi
153b2(mdo sde): char mngon par bab po// me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to// bar snang la yang 'brug sgra chen po gra par gyur to// a
153b3(mdo sde): ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / tsan dan dus kyi rje su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab po// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas
153b4(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung / bcom ldan 'das la
153b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu ganga' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
153b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'ong ba
153b7(mdo sde): de'i snga ltas yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring po ma lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / klu'i bu mo
153b8(mdo sde): bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun 'dar te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / 
154a1(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya steng dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong / 
154a2(mdo sde): ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'bring dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / 
154a3(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang
154a4(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / gnyen mdab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod // 'jig rten dag na
154a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad+ma chus mi chags
154a6(mdo sde): bzhinas 'jig rten snang ba rnam par gzugs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la
154a7(mdo sde): di ring bdag phyag 'tshal// dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags// 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni
154a8(mdo sde): dri ma tha ba sreg shing myu gu bsregs// snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags// bsod nams zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan
154b1(mdo sde): be khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kun nga zla ba dung mdog 'dra// 'di na tshangs pa'i gnas 'khor ba'i lha rnams
154b2(mdo sde): kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur// zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad// de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis
154b3(mdo sde): mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du 'gyur// khyod kyis gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par bgyid// lha dang mi'i sgra skad zil gyis
154b4(mdo sde): gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste/ 'dod chadags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid dang shes rab gsal bar bgyid// dga' dang bgu
154b5(mdo sde): bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa la gas// khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thog/ sa pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis
154b6(mdo sde): te/ khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod ba chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugasu chud // gang dag gi ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad cing 'dra ba// thams
154b7(mdo sde): cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugasu chud pas de slang khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drang du glags lha'i phyir brtson 'dud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed/ 
154b8(mdo sde): khyod kyi thad du lhag par gyur kyang gnas las ma g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/ mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpa' dang yon tan rnams dang
155a1(mdo sde): byams pas pham par mdzad// de slad mi rnamasu zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngoms par 'dzin// mnga' bdag khyod kyis ches rnams byed pa med dang / 
155a2(mdo sde): ya maR+Ya dang zla ba dang ba dang // dbu ba glog sprin tshwa'i chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur thugasu chud// gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyi chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med/ da
155a3(mdo sde): ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga skyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod mi thar pa lags par 'os// gang gi don tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang // gang gi
155a4(mdo sde): don tu rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang // gang gi don tu sbyin dang yang dag sde ma dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu sten pa yi// rnam 'dren khyod kyi smen
155a5(mdo sde): lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul/ dang 'thun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis
155a6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus ma nu ba lung bstan pa'i sladu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom
155a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshalo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
155a8(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod
155b1(mdo sde): kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
155b2(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang / lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/ 
155b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / 'tsham pa'i
155b4(mdo sde): yul du gnas pa 'thob pa logs/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang dang pa'i shas che ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pa dang / mi
155b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos tham sa cad kyis 'bogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don tu
155b6(mdo sde): gnyer ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang / thos pa tshol bas chog ma 'tshal ba dang / thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/ bcom
155b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang / nags dang nags mdab na rgyu ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad
155b8(mdo sde): bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yong su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mar
156a1(mdo sde): tshul la gnas pa dang / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongasu spangs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad bral ba
156a2(mdo sde): lags// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong lags/ bcom
156a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
156a4(mdo sde): rnams yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / gzung ba dang / klag pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa lags/ bcom lda na 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud byir
156a5(mdo sde): rgol ba bcom pa dang / skrag pa dang / 'jig pa thams cad dang bral nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa/ spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub
156a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i chos yang dag par gzhol ba dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
156a7(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po legaso leg so// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa ni/ klu'i bdag po khyod leg so// klu'i
156a8(mdo sde): bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol te/ klu'i rgyal po rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das
156b1(mdo sde): kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad
156b2(mdo sde): yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas/ thams
156b3(mdo sde): cad srung ba dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog par byed kyi/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi
156b4(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'a gyur te/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub
156b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong / ra 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkag dang / chos dkon
156b6(mdo sde): mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / chos 'dod pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang / sems can
156b7(mdo sde): 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyuraro// klu'i
156b8(mdo sde): bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chu sems mi gtong zhing / gzhan
157a1(mdo sde): dag la yang sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang / smon lam la bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / 
157a2(mdo sde): sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang mir skye bar 'gro bar
157a3(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran
157a4(mdo sde): pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba sngags pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
157a5(mdo sde): gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa blta ba la sems can rnams yang dag par 'ju da ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa
157a6(mdo sde): bzhugs pa thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / rgyud zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de
157a7(mdo sde): ngag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i
157a8(mdo sde): bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gces pa dang / gus
157b1(mdo sde): pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / bka' blo bde zhing gso sla la nges pa dang / nga rgyal med cing sri nu byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
157b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur
157b3(mdo sde): te gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brlang zhing gya gyur med po'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna bsal ba dang / gzhan dag gi rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / 
157b4(mdo sde): bde bar sbyar ba la dga' ba ste/ klu'i bdag po che/ sa gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du gnas pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 
157b5(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ lnga po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lte ste/ mes pa'i stobs dang / bsod nas
157b6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs kyi stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i stobs dang / chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag
157b7(mdo sde): po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par gyur tote// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/ gnyis
157b8(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i stobs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po ches de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar
158a1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang / 
158a2(mdo sde): dag zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mos pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / yang dag pa'i las legs par brtson pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos gsum po
158a3(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
158a4(mdo sde): rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po gsum/ 
158a5(mdo sde): gyi yongasasu bsngo ba dang ldan pa dang / bag yod par ga nas pa ste de gnyis// gzhan yang gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par
158a6(mdo sde): smin pa la mi re ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos de ga nyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi da ga ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams
158a7(mdo sde): cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur// klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs don du
158a8(mdo sde): gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sgra don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / dri don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / ro don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / reg bya don tu gnyer ma yin pa ste/ lnga
158b1(mdo sde): ni de dag yin// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don tu gnyer ba yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba yin/ 
158b2(mdo sde): gyi/ lus don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / yon tan don du gnyer ba yin gyi/ srog don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / shes rab don du gnyer ba yin gyi/ reg pa don du gnyer ba
158b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / dge ba don du gnyer ba yin gyi/ tshor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sems can yongasu bskyab pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi// bang gi de don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ 
158b4(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yino// klu'o bdag po ches drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos
158b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa yin te/ drug po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba'i yon tan 'dod kyi gos tshon ca na gyi rtags 'dzin pa tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / ches
158b6(mdo sde): nyan pa 'dod kyi/ 'jig rten rgyang ban pa'i gsang tshig nyan 'dod pa ma yin pa dang chos bstan pa 'dod kyi/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing 'dod pa ma yin pa dang chos la so sor rtogs pa
158b7(mdo sde): 'dod kyi/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos sgrub pa 'dod kyi/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda yongasu tshol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / sangs
158b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos nyin 'dod kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po ches drug po de dag ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin// 
159a1(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po ches brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
159a2(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi gtal dga'i/ theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i gtam la dga'i/ phyin ci log gi gtam la ma yin pa dang / chos kyi lugs
159a3(mdo sde): kyi gtam la dga'i/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyi gtam la dga'i/ 'khor ba bcad pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / zab cing gting
159a4(mdo sde): dpag dka' ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam la dga'i/ bdag tu lta ba 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin dang / rkyen rnam par dag pa'i gtam
159a5(mdo sde): la dga'i/ chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can// dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i gtanal ma yin pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
159a6(mdo sde): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam yang dag pa ji lta ba la dge'o/ dmigs par lta ba'i gtam la yin pa dang rab tu byung ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
159a7(mdo sde): rgyan bkod pa'i gtal dga'i/ zhi ba la btang snyomasu byed pa'i gtam la ma yin te/ klu'i bdag po brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga'
159a8(mdo sde): la dga' bas dga' ba yino// klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ don gyi dbang rnam pa lnga mthong ba'i phyir/ thos pa yongasu tshol ba na chog mi shes te/ lnga gang na na/ 
159b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir/ thos pa yongasu tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
159b2(mdo sde): thos pas 'gyod pa dang the tsom med par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir/ thos pa yongasu tshol na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas kun nas
159b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rtogs par 'gyur par yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir/ thos pa yongasu tshel na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas sem
159b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ nyon mongasapa spong bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir/ thos kha yongasu tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang /
