265a3(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyan na mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongasu rdzogs par
265a4(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyun na/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis
265a5(mdo sde): brgyan na/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa/ dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / dga' ba yong su dag par la/ gyuro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ lta ba ngan pa thams
265a6(mdo sde): cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyuraro// byams pas brgyan na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i semasu 'gyuraro// snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongasu
265a7(mdo sde): mi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bas brgyan na/ zhum pa med pa'i semasu 'gyuraro// btang snyom skye brgyan ni// rje su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyuraro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos
265a8(mdo sde): brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed par 'gyuraro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la mkhas par 'gyuraro// 
265b1(mdo sde): yang dag par spongs pas brgyan na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pas brgyan na// lus
265b2(mdo sde): dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / sems la su rung ba la mkhas pa dang / nyon
265b3(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyu ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzib med cing dbul ba dang / nyes pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi yan lag gis
265b4(mdo sde): brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na du khong du chud par 'gyuraro// lam gyis brgyan na// yang dag pa'i shes sur 'gyur// zhi gnas kyis brgyan na/ 
265b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// lhag mthong gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dang ye
265b6(mdo sde): shesu 'gyuraro// thabs kyis brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba 'thob par 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po mdor na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs
265b7(mdo sde): bcu yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag 'thob
265b8(mdo sde): ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbye bas brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ 
266a1(mdo sde): dper na/ sa la gnas pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba/ 
266a2(mdo sde): dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad dang / sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / lo tog thams cad bskyed pa dang / 
266a3(mdo sde): rmo brko ba bya ba 'byung ba de dag gi gnas ni sa yin// klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang / mir skye ba'i rten to// slob pa dang mi slob pa'i 'bras
266a4(mdo sde): bu brnyed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
266a5(mdo sde): bar gyi rten yi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dge slong de ngag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thang
266a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado// 'phags pa
266a7(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogaso// / mdo che ba'i nang nas bkol bar snang // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po la
266a8(mdo sde): ni mo tra dang / dAn+da shI la dang / mu ni bor ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sde las sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
266b1(mdo sde): phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sA ga ra na ga rA dza pa raM brid tshwa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
266b2(mdo sde): po'imado// / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos
266b3(mdo sde): gnas na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
266b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag pa chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khro ba zhi stong brjod
266b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba rnams yin// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi
266b6(mdo sde): zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad
266b7(mdo sde): ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / 
266b8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes rab tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag
267a1(mdo sde): // brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba ni stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
267a2(mdo sde): de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
267a3(mdo sde): bo'i mdo// rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan
267a4(mdo sde): droSh+kar dA ri ka bya kar Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad/  du/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba rad theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub ses
267a5(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis ts+li sa pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra
267a6(mdo sde): pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bar bya/ bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid
267a7(mdo sde): par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sha stag dang thabs
267a8(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting 'dzin thob pa/ mi
267b1(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ tshig thogs med pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral
267b2(mdo sde): ba zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu ston pa/ mi 'jig pa dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi rang bzhin la the
267b3(mdo sde): tsam med pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa/ tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas
267b4(mdo sde): pa/ sems yongasu ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig
267b5(mdo sde): gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag/ gcig tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bya'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang
267b6(mdo sde): smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang brag cha dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gzung ba
267b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / na mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos pa/ shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems
267b8(mdo sde): can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thog pa med pa/ chos sred pa dang bral ba zhi ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la
268a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bkong ba yongasu zin/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin rtag par rgyun tu mngon tu
268a2(mdo sde): gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyal sna tshogs spangs pa la
268a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ ti nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
268a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'thung dka' dang / spos kyi glang po che dang / brtson pa mi
268a5(mdo sde): gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / spos kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dang / 'brug sgra dang / 'od zer rnam par nges pa'i rgyal
268a6(mdo sde): po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / mthong dga' dang / sems can sgrol dang / rtag
268a7(mdo sde): tu brtson dang / rtag tu dgod dga' dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas
268a8(mdo sde): rnam par gnon pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / bal glang spos kyi glang po che dang / spobs pa zab mo dang / spobs pa chen po dang / chos
268b1(mdo sde): 'phags dang / chos kyi rang bzhin the tsom med gyur dang / seng+ge'i stabasu 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa kun sel dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / seng+ge chen po mngon
268b2(mdo sde): par sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / brjed med dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
268b3(mdo sde): stong dang yang thabs gcig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / ni 'bring dang gzhugs
268b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyos pa ma rnams kyis bkur kyi stir rgya/ bla mar byas/ ri so g+ha/ mchud par byas te/ sangs pa can gyi grang khyo chen pa
268b5(mdo sde): chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ li tsa ts+yai/ dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba/ phyug pa nor mang ba/ 
268b6(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/ longs spyod mang ba/ mdzod dang bang ba mang ba zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri med ma zhes bya ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang
268b7(mdo sde): ldan pa zhig yod/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / de las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig
268b8(mdo sde): bcaso// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyi rol gyi sgo gang gi wa dag kyang mar khu dang 'bru
269a1(mdo sde): mar dag rab tu 'dzag cing / zhan pa dang mgon med pa dang / bkres pa dang sdug phongs pa gang yin pa dag ci bder yongasu spyod// yangs pa can gyi gleng khyer
269a2(mdo sde): chen po na rnga be che dang rdza dang / khar rnga dang / sil snyan dang pheg brdob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par gyur cing / me tog char chen po dag
269a3(mdo sde): kyang rab tu bab par gyur khyim gyi grwa bzhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po bzhi byung zhing kha bye ste/ kun tu snang bar gyur to// bu me de btsas ma thag tu
269a4(mdo sde): skad mi 'byin cing mchi ma mi glog la/ lhag par yang ser mo bcu thal ma sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// sdig las byas pas 'dir ni gtsang ma yi/ 
269a5(mdo sde): lu su mi skye yid 'ong bar min/ sdig la/ nyes byas pas 'dir ni longs spyod dag/ 'byor pa'i khyim rnamasu yang mi skye'o// sbyin du la yang dag sdom dang bag
269a6(mdo sde): yog cing // gus dang bcas par bla ma bsnyen bkur ba'o// gya nom rang bzhin las kyi rtag tu ni// longs spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub// 'dren pa rgyal ba 'od
269a7(mdo sde): srung bsod snyoms phyir// yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na// bdag gis khang bzangs stengs nas mthong gyur cing // mthong nas der ni bdag ying dang ba dran// de tshe bdag
269a8(mdo sde): yid rab tu dang gyur na// bdag la me tog med cing drug pa med// phye ma smos med zas dang skom med pas// ston pa 'di la cis mchod bya skam sems// de nas bdag gi sgrahA/ 
269b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni// 'gro ba dgrol phyir zang zing med spyod cing // 'jig rten brtse phyir thugs rje bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas bsod snyoms slad du 'jig rten brgyan// gal
269b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba de dag mchod 'dod na// sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod kyis smon lam thob// byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang yin pa// de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med
269b3(mdo sde): bar snang sgra thos de nas bdag gis ni// mtshan mchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid skyes nas// khang pa de nas rang gi lus mchongs te/ 
269b4(mdo sde): bar snang ta la srid la 'dug nas ni// ga/ sa bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin rgya la ba 'od srung de'i sku// rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mam
269b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdagi lag mthil du// man dang ba'i phur mtsho byung zhing // de dag bdag gis 'od srung gtor ba dang // me tog gdug su gyur nas mkha' la gnas
269b6(mdo sde): gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa// mtshan gyis sku brgyan de dag bltas na yang // ji ltar 'od srung steng na 'dug pa ltar// de dag la yang me togadugs
269b7(mdo sde): nyid snang // mkha' la gnas bzhin bdag gis tshig smras pa// bskal pa chu rdul skad du spyad bya zhing // byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldogs// bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang
269b8(mdo sde): gnyis gtsor gyur cig/ bad gi sing+ge'i nga ro de thos nas// de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshangs pa yi// lha mi lho min gnod sbyin srin po rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la
270a1(mdo sde): yang dag zhugs// thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lhar skyes shing // las bzang byas pa chung zar ma gyur pas// de nas shi 'phos 'dzam gling 'dir 'das kyis// da
270a2(mdo sde): byi skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams byas// gang sa sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyur ba// deme ba dgos rgyal ba shAkya thub mchod// bdag ni 'dod dang langs spyod mi gnyer te// rtul pa
270a3(mdo sde): yang dang yang du mchod par bya// bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing // nyin cig 'dra bar tshe rabs brgya'ang dran// bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra na// mkhwa
270a4(mdo sde): ba su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyed// de nas bu mo nges tshig su bcad pa de dag smras nas// cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu 'thun
270a5(mdo sde): bas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gyon bzhin du 'byung bar gyur nas/ de'i lus las zla ba las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer gser gyi
270a6(mdo sde): mdog snang ba dag kyang byung // de nas pha ma dag gis de'i mong zla mchog ces bya bar btag so// de nas bu mo zla mchog de skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gtsigs 'di lta ste
270a7(mdo sde): dper na/ bu mo lo brgyad len pa lta bu'i na tshod du kun tu snang // des sa'i phyogs gang dang gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa de dang
270a8(mdo sde): de dag tu 'od zer gser gyi mdog lta bu dag snang bar gyur to// de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i dri dag dang / kha nas kyang ut+pal sngon po'i dro dang byung bar
270b1(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa rigs che ba dang / rig mtho ba dag gis/ bu mo zla mchog gi
270b2(mdo sde): lus kyi gzugs dang / kha dog yongasu rdzogs pa tho so// thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems shin tu dkris par gyur cing / so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 
270b3(mdo sde): de bdag gi chung mar gyur na ci ma rung snya mo// de na skye bo phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las khwa cig ni li tsa byi dri ma med par grags
270b4(mdo sde): ba la snyen par byed sten par byed cing / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to// kha cig ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / sprog dang / an da rnyil dang
270b5(mdo sde): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru bye ma snyed dag/ sbyin zhing 'dod pa bskyed par byed// kha cig ni nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / long spyod dang / kha zas dag ston par
270b6(mdo sde): par byed// kha cig ni bran dang / bran mo dang / las mi dang // zho shes 'tsho ba dag lo gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang brdeg pa las sogs pa dag gis 'jigs pa ston par byed// kha cig ni ma
270b7(mdo sde): tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal te khyod kho bo cag la bu me zla mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de'i phyir khyod la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing / khyod la gnod pa
270b8(mdo sde): chen po yang bya'o zhes zer// de nas li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du/ ma la dpung dag lhags nas/ bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo yang phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang bral bar
271a1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ skrag cing sngangs bsgyid lug cing / spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran pa nyams shing bzhin gyi sro shi la/ rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma blags
271a2(mdo sde): te mig mi 'dzums par bu me zla mchog la lta'o// bu me zla mchog gis rang gis pha ngu zhing yi shi la/ gdong mchi mas yog cing yul yul por gyur pa mthong // mthong nas kyang de la
271a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smra so// yab ci'i slad 'di ltar bshums shing bshums me dag rab tu glog par mdzad lags/ de nas li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa/ bu me zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras// 
271a4(mdo sde): bu mo 'di ltar khyod dbrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad du thab mo dang rtsod pa dag kum tu byung bar khyod kyis te sa sam/ de'i phyir dpung dag lhags shing bcom ste/ khyod phrogs
271a5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur grang snyams nas/ de nas mchi ma byung ba yin mod/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi ba la tshig su bcang smras pa/ gal te 'am gling sems can thams cad
271a6(mdo sde): dag sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // de dag mtshon thogs bdag slad rgyug gyur kyang // de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rngo mi thog/ byams sems ldan la dug dang
271a7(mdo sde): mtshon mi tshugs// ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung // byams sems tha ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas// byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// yab bdag 'jig
271a8(mdo sde): rten dag la byams pa che// ngan bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga' bar gnas// nam yang gzhan la sdug bsngal ma bgyis pas// de phyir ngan bu sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab// chags bral nam
271b1(mdo sde): yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing / byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang mchis ma lags// bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis te/ de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub lag/ 
271b2(mdo sde): dang yum la byams pa mchis pa ltar 'gro ba kun la rgyun tu bdag de bzhin// yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams// de ni nams kyang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// na mkhas dog sa
271b3(mdo sde): 'dzin par bgyid gyur cing // lhun po yungs 'bru'i nang du gnas gyur tam// rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang // bdag 'joms bgyid par rngo thog mi mchis yab// de nas bu mo zla mchog
271b4(mdo sde): gis tshigs bcad pa de dag smras nas/ rang gi ba la 'di skad ces smra so// yab yum de'i slad du/ 'di ltar deng nas dgung bdun na/ bu mo zla mchog phyir byung bar 'gyur zhing / byung nas kyang rang
271b5(mdo sde): gang 'dod pa'i khyim thabs 'dam par 'gyur gyi// de khyed cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing / lam srang dang bani mdo dang sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad kyang rgyan dag gis
271b6(mdo sde): brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i mchog gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces shul ba che dang / bani mdo dang / sum mad thams cad
271b7(mdo sde): du dril dkrol zhing sgra bsgrag tu gsol/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pha ma gnyis rang gi khyim nas byung ste/ 'di skad du deng nas zhag bdun na/ bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar
271b8(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang / mo na gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyi/ der khyod cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing / lam srang dang ba ni mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs
272a1(mdo sde): thams cad rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig/ ces rab
272a2(mdo sde): bzhin de dag kun tu bsgrag so// de skad so sor thos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi skye bo phal po che rnams 'di ltar rang rang gi lam srang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs dag
272a3(mdo sde): brgyan par bya ba la brtson par bya zhing / sems la 'di snyam du cis kyang bu mo zla mchog ni bdag la 'dzin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin grang snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'gran

272a8(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas par pad+ma sdong bu ni gsar/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po mo rje'i snying po las byas pa 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ blta na sdug pa 'odags
272a9(mdo sde): lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs te mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog na 'chag cing 'dug go// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus bu mo bla mchog gi
272b1(mdo sde): ba zhig byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de'i snying po'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog gser 'dra la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ skyes bu chen po'i
272b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzes par byas pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur te/ de
272b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis khyim de thams cad snang bas gsal bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pad+ma de mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong ba dang
272b4(mdo sde): dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu/ ga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku de la tshigasu bcad gsol pa/ 'di 'dra'i

272b6(mdo sde): su ma mchis te// skad cig mdog gser btsod ka dang // myur bar shel 'od 'dra bar gda'// ngan bu slan chad lus kyi ni// 'du shes ma mchis sems mi g.yo// mgon po khyod kyis sku
272b7(mdo sde): mthong nas// bdag ni dga' ba yangs pa skyes// khyod sku dpal 'bar me 'dra zhing // ri las ri bzhin mdzes 'phags pa// ji ltar gzung zhing rab tu gnas// gang nas 'dir byon gang du
272b8(mdo sde): gshegs// de nas de bzhin gshes pa'i sku des// bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshig su bcing bka' stsal pa// nga ni lha min klu yang min// mi 'am ci min gnod sbyin min/ 
273a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya sing+ge yis// nga ni khyod kyi gan du gtang // nga ni lha min gnod sbyin min// klu min mi 'am ci ma min// chos byung ba dang khyod kyi phyir// lha mi 'du
273a2(mdo sde): bas bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bu mo zla mchog gis phyir tshig su bcad de gsol pa// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba// de mdog ci 'dra 'di
273a3(mdo sde): gsungs la// de'i rtags dang dbyibs gsungs dang // de thos rabadag gis rtogs par 'gyur// khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsung na// de'i mdog rtags dang dbyibs mi

273a5(mdo sde): phyir tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa// de ni sku mdog gser 'dra zhing // mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga'// sems can kun gyi mchod rten te// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// 
273a6(mdo sde): byed ldan sems can rnams kyi ni// spyod pa mchog dang dman pa dag/ thugs gtsigs ni rtogs mdzad// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// chos kun rnam pa thams cad du// des ni/ 
273a7(mdo sde): mi mkhyen cung zad med// ye shes kun gyi pha rol byon// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// des ni sems can kun gyi sems// thugs gcig gis ni rtogs gyur kyang // kun gyi
273a8(mdo sde): sems la nam du yang // rlom pa mi mngar gzhan du na// sangs rgyas spyod pa sbyin pas 'phags// tshul khrims spyod pas 'byor 'phags shing // bzod dang brtson pas 'phags
273b1(mdo sde): langang bsam gtan shes rab yang dag 'phags// bzo rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas// des ni mi mkhyen nung zad med// byams dang thugs rje phun sum tshogs// de pyir
273b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhes brjod// gang gis bla med 'khor lo yi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // zhing rnams bye ba rnam rig la// bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing // gang gis sangs rgyas

273b7(mdo sde): ldan gyur cing stobs bcu mnga'// mi bsnyengs rtogs par thug su chud// sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// dbu'i gtsug tor ltar mi mthong // 
273b8(mdo sde): spyan mnga' dag dang ldan pa dang // stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing // byang chub yan lag lam la gnas// ngang tshul bzang zhing 'grogs na bde// zhi zhing dul la bla na med// 
274a1(mdo sde): g.yo med drang po gsal ba ste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// de ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing // de la g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// sems can don gyi dus
274a2(mdo sde): gsungs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod// yon tan kun dang legs ldan zhing // de ni 'gro ba'i mchod rten te// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de phyir sangs rgyas

274a8(mdo sde): med dga' bar 'gyur lags grang // bskal pa stong phrag bye bar 'jig rten na// skyes bu mchog rnams mthong ba shin tu dkon// dgra bcom de'i mtshan dang thos bdag
274b1(mdo sde): ning rnyed par legs rnyed bdag gis rgyal ba blta// sprul pa de yis de la 'di skad smras// sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs// de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad

274b3(mdo sde): thob la// thos pas mi 'khrugs rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis// bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gas 'dong // dong nas sangs rgyas ji snyed sngon

274b7(mdo sde): lhar bzhugs pa de nyid thogs bzhin du/ khang bzangs kyi steng de nas babs nas/ rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rang gi pha mchigasu bcad smras pa/ yang
274b8(mdo sde): gzigs ngan bu'i sug pa lag pa na// pad+ma gser sdong mdzes pa yid du mchi// skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gzigs shig yum// mthong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mchi// rang gi
275a1(mdo sde): gnas kun gser mdog 'dra ba yi// 'od kyi gsal bar bdag gis mthong lags yum// skad cig la yang du mar mdog 'gyur bas// sku yi tshad ni gzung bar rngom
275a2(mdo sde): thog de slad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar tshal chen du// rgyal ba go'u ta ma gzigasu gshegs yum// me tog rnams dang spos mchog bsnams na su// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod par
275a3(mdo sde): bgyir/ zla ba chog gi ba dang ma dag gis// yid du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legaso zhes// gos rnams dang ni bdug spos spos dag dang // me tog rnams dang phreng ba byug pa'ang blangs// 
275a4(mdo sde): chen rdza rnga hapa shang gdugs rnams dang / dung dang rgyan mtshan gling bu pi wang dang // rin chen sil snyan yid 'ong thogs nas ni// de dag khang pa de nas nges par 'byung // 
275a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe na zhim bdun pa de la srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag/ bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur na/ sa// de dag kha cig ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems
275a6(mdo sde): kun nas dkris par gyur// kha cig ni lta 'dod par gyur/ kha cig ni rtog pa skyes par gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to// khye'u dang

275a8(mdo sde): mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du pha ma dang 'khor mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / ma
275b1(mdo sde): tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa de dag gis
275b2(mdo sde): yongasu pag cing mdun du bdang te/ rang gi gnas nas byung// de nas srog chags 'bum phrag dum dag gis de grong bar gyi dbus byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o// 
275b3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o// bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyu go// de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grongs khyer chen po na skye bo phal po che de dag lhan cig tu
275b4(mdo sde): rgyug pa'i tshe// ha ha tshur shog/ tshur shog ces bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de'i mod la skye bo phal po che rgyug pa de dag mthong nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin ga
275b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gi na mkha' la shing rta la'i srid du mngon par/ 'phags te 'dug par gyur to// 'dug nas kyang skye bo phal po
275b6(mdo sde): che de dag la tshig su bcad smras pa/ bzod lnga na bdag gi mdzes pa'i lus 'di ni chags pa'i sems las byung ba ma yin te/ kha dog gser mdog me lce 'bar 'dra ba
275b7(mdo sde): shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di ltos// gang dag yul rnams la ni bdam med nas// me mdag 'obs 'dra rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing // dbang po drug rnams sngam pas
275b8(mdo sde): bsdams pa dang // gang dag tshangs spyod rnam spyod dag pa dang // gang dag gzhan gyi bud med rnams mthong na// ma sring snyam du 'du shes skyeng byed na// de dag mdzes shing shin
276a1(mdo sde): rgyu blta sdug la// rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byeng ba// bdag gi sbur khu nas byung ba'i dri/ 'dzad can
276a2(mdo sde): sems kyis bdag gis de ma bsgrubs// de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin// kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi skyed// 'dod chags bral la chags pa ma
276a3(mdo sde): skyed cig/ ji ltar smras bden nams yang brdzun min te// mdun gyi thub dbang 'di ni bdag gi dbang // sngan chad khyed cag kho mo'i bar gyur la// kho mo 'ang khyed kyi ma dang phu nu
276a4(mdo sde): dang // sring mo 'am par yang yang dang yang gyur pas// su zhig ma la 'dod chags sems skyed byed// sngan chad kho mos khyed cag bsad gyur cing // khyed kyi
276a5(mdo sde): kho mo 'ang sngan chad bsad gyur pas// thams cad phan tshun dag po gshed yin na// khyed cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed// chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'grur
276a6(mdo sde): zhing / chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// chags pa'i sems ldan mya ngan mi 'da' bas// de phyir 'dod chags yongasu spang bar bya// 'dod pa'i gzhi las
276a7(mdo sde): dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags las ni yi dwags dud 'gror 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags dkris pa'i sems ldan pa// grul bu lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur/ 
276a8(mdo sde): 'dod chags las ni nang mang po dang // lce med gzugs mi sdug pa dag tu gyur// gang dag 'dang chags ngan pa'i byang chu ste// rnam kyi tshogs sbyin gyi sno 'gyur/ 
276b1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang // sum cu gsum pa'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dbang ldan dbang skur gang yin pa// de'i tshangs spyod yangs basbyang ba yin// rtag tu
276b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag la brkam pa rnams// dmus longs 'on pa glen pa khyi phag dang // rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang ba dang // stag dang gnag rta phye blab sbrang bur 'gyur// gong dag tshangs spyod
276b3(mdo sde): yangs pa spyod byed pa// sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnam da ni// tshong dpon khyim bdag blon por gyur nas ni// bde zhing yid bang zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur// rang rgyal rnams dang de bzhin dag
276b4(mdo sde): bcom dang // sangs rgyas mtshan gyis spras pa gsal gyur zhing // bla med byang chub zhi pa rtogs gyur nas// sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur// 'dod pas 'khol
276b5(mdo sde): bdag ni bsregs pa dang // yang na du bas bdug cing bsad/ pa 'am// bcing dang de bzhin brdeg bsdigs mgo dang ni/ rna mig sna dang rkang pa bcad par 'gyur// 
276b6(mdo sde): 'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu ma zad// 'dod rnams mi 'thun nyes pa mtha' yang med// gal te myur du las thar 'dong na// tshur sheg rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar 'deng // lha mis
276b7(mdo sde): mchod pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par// rten dang dpung gnyen gzhan dag yod min zhing // rgyal po 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar dkon gyis// thams cad lhan cig 'gregs
276b8(mdo sde): te 'dong bar bya// bu mo zla mchog gis tshig su bcad ba de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mdo las chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing namakha'i dkyil na 'khong pa'i lha'i bu
277a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu byung ste/ me togi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ sil snyan bye ba
277a2(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu bsil to// skye bo bal po che de dag kyang shin tu yid byung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas// 'ga' yang
277a3(mdo sde): phyin chad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro bo dang thab dang / 'chab pa dang gnod sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems kyi sgrib pa dang ldan pa dang
277a4(mdo sde): bral la/ lus rab tu sim zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog de la ma dang sring mo dang / ston pa lta bur sdug par gyur cing phyag byas te/ ji ltar thogs
277a5(mdo sde): ba'i me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / thug pa de dag gis kyang mngon par gto ro// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mdo la
277a6(mdo sde): me tog de dag me tog gdugs dpag tshad phyed tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog
277a7(mdo sde): bar snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa la ma reg par na mkha' la 'chags bzhin du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung // de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang / bteg pa thad
277a8(mdo sde): dus chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa yang bu mo zla mchog song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshe
277b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ 
277b2(mdo sde): yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo zla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongasu bskor zhing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong
277b3(mdo sde): nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang 'od srung chen po bu mo zla mchog 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag
277b4(mdo sde): cag gis 'di ci bzod pa thob pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par byas/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs dri bar bya 'am zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dge slong
277b5(mdo sde): de dag dang lhan cig tu bu mo zla mchog ga la bde ro song ste phyin nas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo khyod gar 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
277b6(mdo sde): gang 'di skad du bu mo khyod gar 'gro zhes gsung ba ni/ gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mtsho lagaso// shA ra bI'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni yangs pa can du 'jug la/ 
277b7(mdo sde): khyod ni yangs po can nas 'byung na/ 'o na khyod 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi la gso zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur// bu mos smras pa
277b8(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod zhabs gang nas 'deg cing gang du 'jog par mdzad lags/ shA ridwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni rkang pa na mkha' las 'deg cing / na mkha'i nyid la
278a1(mdo sde): 'jog par byed// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang sdug pa na mkha' las 'dag cing / na mkha' nyid la 'dzeg par bgyid/ nam pa'i
278a2(mdo sde): khams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i slad du bdag gis 'di skad ces khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lagaso zhes smras
278a3(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i buM khyod gar gshegs/ shA ra dwa ti'i dus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thad
278a4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags pas/ blad ga kyang dor mchi ba lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras// ba/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongasu mya ngan las
278a5(mdo sde): 'das par mchi ba yongasu mya ngan las 'dra bar 'gro ba yin na 'on khyod ci'i phyir yongasu mya ngan 'das par mi 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yongasu mya ngan
278a6(mdo sde): las 'das par mchi ba yongasasu mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing / yongasu mya ngan 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang / 'jigs pa yang ma mchis la/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par
278a7(mdo sde): mchi ba la ma gtogs par gang yang yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ yongasu mya ngan 'das par mchi ba nyid yongs
278a8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa lags pa'i slada'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras// bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi
278b1(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs yin/ bu mo/ 
278b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/ khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes gsungs pa ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhus/ 
278b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdag tu gsol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyed kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de/ ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang
278b4(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags/ shA
278b5(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin// de ci'i// phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa 'am/ spros pa/ 'ga' yang med la/ tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin// gcig
278b6(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang ma yin sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos
278b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang / tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur pa 'am/ yong su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur pa'i chos de dmigasu ma mchis lags
278b8(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na/ gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
279a1(mdo sde): bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas shes gsungs pa ni/ de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa
279a2(mdo sde): la'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings kyang ji skad cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sreng po ji snyed pa'o// 
279a3(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ma rig pa srid pa'i sred pa yang ji skad cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus
279a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ bum sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
279a5(mdo sde): kyi yul ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig lan btab pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti 'u gnas brtan gyis gang yongasu dris pa
279a6(mdo sde): de nyid kyi lan bdag gis btab lags// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu ma/ thabs ci zhig yongasu dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i buM yi ge gang dag yongasu dris pa de
279a7(mdo sde): dge nyid nges par bstan lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdag su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nus// 
279a8(mdo sde): bu mas smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gags pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongasu dris
279b1(mdo sde): pa dang / gang gis lan btab pa de gzhi ga yang dmigasu ma mchis lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag pa
279b2(mdo sde): yod gzhan yin pas// khyod ni ring bar ma thogs par blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
279b3(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag so// nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ring baM zhes
279b4(mdo sde): bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'cha
279b5(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun pa shA dwa ti'i bu/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/ 'gags pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma
279b6(mdo sde): mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don cig pa ma lags pa/ don tha dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis
279b7(mdo sde): pa lags pas/ de la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigasu ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma
279b8(mdo sde): lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyi su ma mchis shing / gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces
280a1(mdo sde): smraso/ bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig dang / kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dong // de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i
280a2(mdo sde): bu la bu mo zla mchogs 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'tshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lagaso// shA ra dwa ti'i bus
280a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu me 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyangasakya tsha sa rnams la'o// shA ra
280a4(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can mang po dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la chos ston par mdzad dam/ 
280a5(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu de bzhi/ gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ 
280a6(mdo sde): bdag cag la chos ston par mdzad pa'o// 'di ni chos te bstan par bgyi ba'o// snyam du sems lags kyi/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ chos ma
280a7(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems pa ma mchis lag so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta bu'i
280a8(mdo sde): spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na/ dar ni chos bstan pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag zan bcad phyir log na ni 'o bu cag
280b1(mdo sde): la legs kyi/ bdag cag chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol tu gyur na ni ma yin// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag phyir phyogs te/ de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to// de nas du ma
280b2(mdo sde): zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'as ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
280b3(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos pa dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal
280b4(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mngon par rab tu gtor to// skye bo phal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug
280b5(mdo sde): spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gtor ma thag tud nas de'i modo la me tog de dag me togi gdugs rgya
280b6(mdo sde): dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang na kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces
280b7(mdo sde): smra so/ bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs gang bdag gi sug pa g.yas
280b8(mdo sde): ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la zhugs pa 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir byon la/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni/ gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu ma
281a1(mdo sde): 'di ni sprul pa ste/ sprul pa ni 'chi 'pho yang med la skye ba yang med// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis chos thams
281a2(mdo sde): cad la gang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ skye ba ma mthong lag so// de nas byang chub sems dang mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smra so// bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub
281a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sbyar bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas/ 
281a4(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzin gyis/ bu mo zla mchog/ la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin
281a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lag so// byang
281a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod chos kyi gtam la spobs par gyis shig/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba
281a7(mdo sde): dang / rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings yi ger 'grang ba yang ma lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon
281a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du sted du gzigs shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang
281b1(mdo sde): de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/ nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lag so// byang
281b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin byin zhing / ji ltar yongasu bsngos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi
281b3(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhigis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na/ de la rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig 'byu
281b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa/ bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba mdo// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la de ltar sbyin
281b5(mdo sde): pa byin zhing yongasu bsngo ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par
281b6(mdo sde): byed bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta bu kho na bzhin du'o// smras pa/ bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'das pa
281b7(mdo sde): yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ de ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags// da ltar byung ba yang ma la
281b8(mdo sde): pas byams pa sgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o// zhes gdags par rngo mi thogs lag so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ches kyi mig thob
282a1(mdo sde): bam bums smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang mtho ba lags na/ chos kyi mig la thong bar gal 'gyur/ bya chub sems dpa' turnam
282a2(mdo sde): pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod yun ji srid gcig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas/ smig su
282a3(mdo sde): chu yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas/ bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lag so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras// 
282a4(mdo sde): bu mo yun ji srid cigs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid cig byang chub sems dpa'
282a5(mdo sde): byams pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid/ kyis lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
282a6(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po// go cha chen po bgos pa/ 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par smra yang
282a7(mdo sde): 'jigs par mi bgyid/ dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lagaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mcho gis 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa
282a8(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/ ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lag so// btsun pa shA
282b1(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pa tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ de dag thams cad bdag
282b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mi byang chub thob na khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bu
282b3(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems can dman pa la mos pa/ shes
282b4(mdo sde): rab chung ba gzhan gyi don la me lte ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gis ming yang grags par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur 'gyur lagaso// shA ra dwa ti'i bus
282b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ni gcig/ de bzhin nyid ni ci go zhes zer na/ 'o na ci dkyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid yin la/ ci sangs rgyas
282b6(mdo sde): rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper 'gyi na/ ba lang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags pa dang / rgya mtsho
282b7(mdo sde): chen po gang lag pa'i chab de dag la ni bye brag chung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma sa ga mas tshas lanags
282b8(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par 'byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis mang
283a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo ma thog lag so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper
283a2(mdo sde): bgyi na yungs 'bru'i khongasu chud pa'i namakha'i khams gang lags pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongasu chud pa'i na mkha'i khams gang lags
283a3(mdo sde): ba'i na mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongasu chud pa'i na mkha' la ni phyogs bcu'i khongasu chud pa'i na mkha'
283a4(mdo sde): ltar grongs dang grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag rab tu mi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas la/ ri'i rgyal po rib dag kyang ma mchis/ rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma
283a5(mdo sde): mchis lag so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin// gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis
283a6(mdo sde): pa gcig las nges par byung ba legs mod kyi/ 'o na kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad
283a7(mdo sde): ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma yin nam
283a8(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig zhes gsung ba ni skur pa 'debs pa lag so// shA ra dwa ti'i dus
283b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo tsa'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du khyod nyid la yongasu zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun
283b2(mdo sde): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe/ ji ga stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun tu gnas par gyur lags sam/ dzag
283b3(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad kyis khyod log su mngon par phyogs te btud/ mngon par btud mngon par rab tu btud lags sam/ ji ga ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags ma/ 
283b4(mdo sde): jig sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur lags sam/ jig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa
283b5(mdo sde): yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar chu gas pa'i bar dag 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar rgyu/ ra lags sam/ dzi gA lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis
283b6(mdo sde): lags sam/ jig bdud kyis sa dang na mkha' dpag tshad sum cu tshun chad dpung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems kyi skad cig gcig dang
283b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol lags sam/ jig khyod byang chub pa dang dus gcig kho na bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu ma
283b8(mdo sde): khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad smras pa/ de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang ma byung // bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la
284a1(mdo sde): gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pas na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mchog la log so// shes bya ba byin te/ bu mo la gso legs
284a3(mdo sde): bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod lag so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa byung bar gyur pa
284a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa de/ pad+ma'i gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba'i khung du zhug so// de nas de'i
284a5(mdo sde): mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ga sdong bu
284a6(mdo sde): rnams ni gser/ 'dabs ma rnams ni dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan
284a7(mdo sde): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med padag tu
284a8(mdo sde): gshegs te/ sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa de dag kyang 'dir kun tu grag go/ 
284b1(mdo sde): de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ des lag pa g.yas pa
284b2(mdo sde): na thogs par gyur pa'i pad+ma gang yin pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su 'bang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de me togi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug
284b3(mdo sde): pang cha mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi na mkha' la 'dug par gyur to// bangs brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan
284b4(mdo sde): rkang pa rin po ched spras pa lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma gting ba zhig byung bar gyur to// khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ci
284b5(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhu gas par yang kun tu snang // des pad+ma de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
284b6(mdo sde): bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa/ nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs
284b7(mdo sde): kyi mthus / de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su 'phangaso// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang
284b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
285a1(mdo sde): / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi
285a2(mdo sde): mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
285a3(mdo sde): steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rtag pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang
285a4(mdo sde): yongasu rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang drang / gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa
285a5(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom// ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa
285a6(mdo sde): bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'disaphyin ci log bzhi spangs pa'i slad/ sems can rnams la
285a7(mdo sde): chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang so// 'phangs
285a8(mdo sde): ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib
285b1(mdo sde): ba lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spangs pa'i sladadu chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / nges
285b2(mdo sde): de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di
285b3(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la rten pa'i sems can rnams la skye mched drug yongasu 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i sladadu chos ston par gyur
285b4(mdo sde): cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag pa/ pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcomaldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag
285b5(mdo sde): tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di
285b6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun yongasu 'tshal bar bgyi bar slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
285b7(mdo sde): de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i
285b8(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams
286a1(mdo sde): la log pa nyid brgyad nges par spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / 
286a2(mdo sde): des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad
286a3(mdo sde): ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kunas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu
286a4(mdo sde): spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su 'phang
286a5(mdo sde): so 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug drang zad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan
286a6(mdo sde): 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig/ de nas pad+ma
286a7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i phang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to// de'i tshe na sa dra ba'i lha yan tshad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams
286a8(mdo sde): la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi'i jig pa bskul nas/ lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzums pa mdzad// 'di ni sangs rgyas
286b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum
286b2(mdo sde): phrag du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / brtsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
286b3(mdo sde): yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis gnan nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das
286b4(mdo sde): kying bu'i gtsug tu nu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa
286b5(mdo sde): la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongasu zhugs pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum
286b6(mdo sde): spyan mnga' zhing // chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam dag la// 'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam thugs mnga' ba// rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod kyi mtha'
286b7(mdo sde): yas dus nas sbyin pa byin// khyod khrims rnams dag nor bu rin chen 'dra// khyod kyis bzod pa'ang mi g.yos lhun po bzhin// drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// bsam
286b8(mdo sde): gtan brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol// rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo// thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// byams
287a1(mdo sde): / la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa'o// thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas// 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs pas la rab tu zhig/ thub dbang ci sla
287a2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod spu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer des// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnamasu// nyi zla myur du mogo mog rab mdzad// gzi brjid zil gyis
287a3(mdo sde): gnon cing mig kyang rtsol// 'gro ba'i mgon gcig khyod gsung rnam par dag/ snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug tu ldan// gang dag nyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing // nyon mongs thams
287a4(mdo sde): cad ma lus zhi bar bgyid// phyogs bcum tha' yos sems can gang mchis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa du ma gang lags pa// de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po// rang
287a5(mdo sde): byung ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// deng su 'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges// su zhig sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs// khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams
287a6(mdo sde): rab tu grub// thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gang gis de ring bdud bzhi pham bgyis shing // nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud chen dang // gang gis phung po lta bu mang
287a7(mdo sde): bo'i bdud// pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad// de ring su zhig don chen yangs 'gyur zhing // su zhig chos lo legs bgyid mi seng+ge// de ring su zhig sgra ni phyogs rnams/ 
287a8(mdo sde): mching thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// kun mkhyen mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa// sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po// g.yo ba kun dang rtog pa rnam spal
287b1(mdo sde): / ba' drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// de ring su zhig yangs pa chen po 'thob// deng su'i stobs kyi smon pa legs 'grub cing // deng su stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur
287b2(mdo sde): dgra thul ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// de rang su zhag yangs pa chan pa 'theg/ mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye cher bcas
287b3(mdo sde): dngang / sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bud med rnams// dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba lta// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po ni// dam chos 'tshal ba rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ phyogs bcu dag
287b4(mdo sde): nas lhags pa dag thul ba// yongs dag thun/ mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigasu bcad bka' stsal
287b5(mdo sde): ba gang gis rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mcho ga mthong nas// byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems skyed cing nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa// mdun gyi bu mo mthong
287b6(mdo sde): ngam kun dga' bo// 'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang // rgyal ba gsum brgya legs par mchod byas shing // ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog reg ces// rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon
287b7(mdo sde): sum zhus// nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror me song zhing // 'di ni rtag tu lha mo'i 'jig rten skyes// nam yang byang chub sems ni ma brjed cing // 'chi dus byas kyang rtag tu tshe rabs
287b8(mdo sde): dran nga rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni// khang bzangs steng nas mdzes pa'i lus 'chongs te// rgya chen sems kyis 'od srung de mchod nas// de nas rjes 'thun bzod pa thob par
288a1(mdo sde): // gyur sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces mtshan gsol pa// de la na bza' dam pa phrugs phul bas// de phyir 'di yi lus mdog ser 'dra la// mdzes shing dag la zla ba 'dra ba yin// 
288a2(mdo sde): ston pa gser thub ces bya gang yin pa// de la bdug spos mchog phul bas na// de'i phyir 'di yi kha dang spu khung nas// ut+pal tsan+dan dri dang rab tu byung // gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis
288a3(mdo sde): mchog de la// 'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags gyur pas// de phyir 'di yi mig mdog mthon ting la// 'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur// tshe rabs lnga brgya dag tu 'dod
288a4(mdo sde): spangs shing // tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas// de'i phyir chags pas gdungs pas 'di mthong na// de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral gyur// sum curtsa
288a5(mdo sde): gsum gnas nas 'di 'phos te// 'dir li tsa byi khyim ni yang / sa par skyes// skye dgu kun tu tshe rab dran gyur cing // tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes// bam yongasu
288a6(mdo sde): smin par bya ba dang // de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing // la la byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed phyir// de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyed// bud med skyes pa nye
288a7(mdo sde): du mdza' bshes dang // gzho nu gzhonu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir// de dag stong phrag drug cu 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas// 'di ni ring po mi thogs bud
288a8(mdo sde): kyir lus bsgyur nga yi bstan la rab byung zhing // tshang spyod dam pa rgya chen spyad byas nas// shi 'phos lha'i'ajig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// lha gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni// dus mtha'i
288b1(mdo sde): tshen chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing // 'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni// 'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur// gang tshe mi 'pham dgra las rgyal ba po// dung gi srasu
288b2(mdo sde): gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe// de ni bzo don rgyu rtsal bya ba kun// shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun ldan 'gyur// srog chags brgya phrag du mas mdun bdar cing // zla ba gsum du rgyal bde
288b3(mdo sde): mchod nas// de ni srog chags drug stong sum brgya dang // lhan cig khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung 'gyur zhing // rgyal ba mi 'pham bzhugs dang 'das pa yi// tshe skyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur
288b4(mdo sde): de 'dra'i dbang bapo de nas shi 'phos nas// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khamasu 'gro/ blo ldan des ni 'od pag med pa dang // gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bye mang gaN+DI
288b5(mdo sde): klang gi ni// bye snyed mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur// ting 'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing // bskal bzangs la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'i// rang byung
288b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams la phan brtson pa// 'jig rten mgon deg la'ang bsnyen bkur byed// bye mang bskal par de dag mchod byas te// sems can bye mang yongasu smin byas shing // bskal pa bye ba
288b7(mdo sde): stong phrag brgyad cu na// rgyal ba zla mchog ces ni bya bar 'gyur// zla mchog rkang gnyis gtso bo'i mdzod spu nas// 'od zer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ong ba// gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag
288b8(mdo sde): gis 'jig rten khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur// gang phyir 'od kyis 'jig rten de khyab pas// gnyi zla me dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni// snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar tshe min zhing // nyin dang
289a1(mdo sde): mtshan yang bgrang du yod ma yin// de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod min zhing // nyan thos rnams med mu stegs can tshogs med// mnyam med de'i dge 'dun rnams
289a2(mdo sde): dag cing // bud med rnam par spangs pa nyid du 'gyur// mi rnams thams cad gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can blta na sdug/ mnga' na mi gnas 'dod
289a3(mdo sde): pa mi sten cing // pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye zhing 'byung // rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa// da ni bgrang bas rtog par mi nus shing // thams cad mngon shes thob pa
289a4(mdo sde): ngal spyod dang // mi skye bzod cing mnyam mdo chags med// de na bdud med dmigs can yod min zhing // bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin yod ma yin// 'jig rten khams de
289a5(mdo sde): dag cing dga' ldan gyi// nye bar spyod pa'i rnam ba 'dra bar 'gyur// gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dri mchog sa// spras shing gtsang la dri med langs pa yin// rgyal ba de'i
289a6(mdo sde): sku tshe lo grangs ni// stong phrag bye ba bdun bcu gsum du 'gyur// ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas// de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas shing // bzhugs bzhin du mya ngan 'das na
289a7(mdo sde): 'ang de yi ni// dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med// gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi// phun sum tshogs pa bskal par brjod byas kyang // rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig
289a8(mdo sde): bzhin du// dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba yi no// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas// dga' ba dang mchog tu dga'
289b1(mdo sde): ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phag so// mngon par 'phags ma thag tu bu mo de'i bud med kyis lus gyur cing // skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par
289b2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang // 'jig rten du sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ me togi char dag kyang rab tu phab// lha dang mi'i sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar gyur to// 
289b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcas
289b4(mdo sde): bdag gis mngon par bstod ga ri rab g.yo zhing na mkhara' sar ltung la/ lha gnas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho mi g.yo gung zla ltung yang gdar// de
289b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sho ba'i tshig mi gsung // phyogs bcu'i sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing // zhugs ni chab 'gyur cheb ni zhugs 'gyur gdal
289b6(mdo sde): mnyam med thub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// 'gro la phan bzhed log pa'i tshig mi gsung // bar snang dogs kun tu 'dzin gyur zhing // yungs 'bru'i nang du zhing brgya chud 'gyur
289b7(mdo sde): lagaser ma zhags pas gzung bar rngo thog gda'// rgyal ba log pa'i tshig ni gsung mi 'gyur// de 'drar yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i// rgyal ba des bdag byang chub nges bstan cing
289b8(mdo sde): gang phyir dog sa kun tu rab g.yos pas// byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur gor ma bkum// sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na// rang byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang / 
290a1(mdo sde): // sngan chad skal brgyad bdag gis gang btsal ba// de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskur// lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang // dge bsnyen rnams
290a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag/ thams cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi// bde gshegs 'gyur gyis som nyi ma byed cig/ chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// rgyal ba rnams kyis
290a3(mdo sde): longs spyod mi 'dra zhing // bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang // sems can srog med gang zag med pa gsungs// gzod nas ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams kun// rang bzhin dag cing
290a4(mdo sde): nyid med// bdag sngon bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gang // de ni dngos med gsog stong ya ma rla// phyi mi'i dngos de'ang stong zhing skad cig ste// dngos med g.yo gseg dang ya ma rla// rtog dang
290a5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing // rtog gyur de yang ma kha' la bya rjes bzhin// gang zhig mnyam med byang chub la tshang rgya zhing // thul dka' bdud kyang rab tu gzhom pa
290a6(mdo sde): dang / stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khamasu ni// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa skor 'dod pa// des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu
290a7(mdo sde): mchod kyis dang // de ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur// skyes bu'i rtsal 'phags gsungs snyan mthar byon pa// rgyal ba mi mchog
290a8(mdo sde): gcol phyag 'tsha'o// dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po rtsol mdzad pa// thub pa tshes dbyig 'byung gnas dbang phyug stod// bde ba'i 'byung gnas pa de kun rapo stsol pa// de bzhin gshe
290b1(mdo sde): pa bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs// bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog/ rang byung dbang ldan sred bral bstod par bgyi// bdag gis phyogasu bltas na de dag tu// sdig med
290b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong // shAkya seng+ge ji lta de lta bur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston// rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig/ de
290b3(mdo sde): chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig/ sems can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges par// gang la bzod 'di mchos pa rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis
290b4(mdo sde): tshig su bcad pa de dag smras nas// bar snang de las babs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugaso// nges rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas
290b5(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan to// de sangs rgyas
290b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing // bdag nyid lung bstan pa yang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ 
290b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung ba gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gsol// bcom ldan 'ad
290b8(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u de'i phyir pha ma dag gnang bar byed du chug shig/ de nas khye'u de ni pha ma dag gis chos 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing / de mngon sum du lung bstan pa yang rno/ 
291a1(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lag so// bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob
291a2(mdo sde): bar bgyi lag so zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung // de nas khye'u rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
291a3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgo// dge slong lnga brgyan
291a4(mdo sde): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo//  sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong ma nyis brgya dang / srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo
291a5(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog da/ nga / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub
291a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan
291a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// / 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin
291a8(mdo sde): mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar ska du/ Ar+ya bi kur ba rA dza pa ri brid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa/ 
291b1(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
291b2(mdo sde): na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong ni khri'i dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 
291b3(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / seng+ge'i blo gros dang / seng+ge'i tog dang / seng+ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro la sogs pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa khri dang
291b4(mdo sde): yang thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po yang de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
291b5(mdo sde): 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i nang na 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291b6(mdo sde): po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo
291b7(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das
291b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs dga' zhig zhu lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sed
292a1(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la dri ba lan bdab pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la skabs
292a2(mdo sde): phyes rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po khyed ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas khyed kyi dri ba de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das
292a3(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la skabs phye ba dang / tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te dga' ba dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
292a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams theg pa chen po la/ de la rnam par 'phrul pa des kyang bdud tham
292a5(mdo sde): cad dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / dmigs par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thad tshar bkum nas/ theg pa chen po 'di la bgod pa dang / 
292a6(mdo sde): smon lam phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtul zhugs grub pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol
292a7(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po legaso legs// rnam par
292a8(mdo sde): 'phrul pa'i rgyal ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu dri bar sems pa yang leg so// rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la rung shig dang /
